title: Bitcoin Nears All-Time High as Whale Behavior Suggests Further Upside
body: Bitcoin continues to show signs of recovery as its price rebounds from a brief correction last week. At the time of writing, the crypto is trading at $109,693, reflecting a 0.4% increase over the past 24 hours. Despite this upward movement, the current price remains roughly 2% below its all-time high of over $111,000, recorded last month. This ongoing strength in price performance has been accompanied by notable on-chain signals, particularly from large holders. CryptoQuant contributor Crypto Dan recently analyzed the current market structure and behavior of Bitcoin whales. Related Reading: Bitcoin Recovers From $100K Dip While On-Chain Data Shows Rising Miner Activity Bitcoin Whale Behavior Suggests Further Upside In his latest analysis, Dan observed that despite Bitcoin hovering near record levels, there is little evidence of the profit-taking behavior typically observed during previous market tops. According to him, whales are not engaging in mass selloffs, suggesting that these investors expect the rally to continue. Dan emphasized that these large holders are likely waiting for more pronounced market euphoria and higher valuations before initiating substantial sell activity, a pattern often seen near the final stages of a bull market. Bitcoin ‚Äì Near All-Time Highs but No Profit-Taking ‚ÄúWhales show no intention of taking profits at this price level and are likely to wait for higher prices, where significant market overheating and a bubble form, before making their moves.‚Äù ‚Äì By @DanCoinInvestor pic.twitter.com/W5PtrHo0Q5 ‚Äî CryptoQuant.com (@cryptoquant_com) June 11, 2025 Whale Exchange Activity Indicates Similar Move Further reinforcing the current sentiment, another CryptoQuant analyst, Darkfost, highlighted a significant trend in Binance whale behavior. According to Darkfost, historical data shows that when Bitcoin approaches or breaches its all-time high, there is typically a sharp rise in exchange inflows, driven by whales seeking to take profits. This pattern was visible during earlier cycle peaks, where inflows reached $5.3 billion in early 2024, and even higher levels of $8.45 billion and $7.24 billion in previous cycles. A strong bullish signal from Binance whales! ‚ÄúToday, however, inflows are just around $3 billion and are continuing to decline, suggesting that these whales prefer to keep holding.‚Äù ‚Äì By @Darkfost_Coc Full analysis ‚§µÔ∏èhttps://t.co/T1FlLnM4nK pic.twitter.com/O3XrqhAyEc ‚Äî CryptoQuant.com (@cryptoquant_com) June 11, 2025 In contrast, recent inflows to Binance remain substantially lower. Darkfost reports current inflows hovering around $3 billion, and more importantly, on a declining trajectory. This divergence from historical patterns suggests that whales are refraining from selling at current levels. Related Reading: Bitcoin To $1 Million? Michael Saylor Laughs Off Crypto Winter Fears Their reduced activity implies an expectation that higher prices may lie ahead, and that they are positioning for potentially greater returns later in the cycle. This restraint from large holders is seen as an important signal, especially given the influence whale movements can have on market liquidity and price action. Featured image created with DALL-E, Chart from TradingView

title: GENIUS Act Clears Senate with Bipartisan Support
body: Championed by Senate Majority Leader John Thune and supported by President Donald Trump, the bill seeks to solidify the US as a global crypto leader. However, Senator Elizabeth Warren strongly opposes it due to inadequate consumer protections and ethical concerns about Trump‚Äôs crypto ties. Meanwhile, the House is also progressing on the CLARITY Act, which outlines roles for the SEC and CFTC in regulating digital assets and ensures user protections. It received strong committee support and now heads to the House floor. Separately, Representative William Timmons pressed the SEC for transparency on Ethereum‚Äôs regulatory status, and criticized the agency's inconsistent stance. Senate Moves Forward on GENIUS Act The US Senate took a major step toward regulating stablecoins by voting 68-30 to advance the Guiding and Establishing National Innovation for US Stablecoins, or GENIUS Act. The bipartisan support came more than a month after the bill was first introduced, with Senate Majority Leader John Thune championing the legislation on the floor. Thune echoed President Donald Trump‚Äôs position that the bill could help the US become the ‚Äúcrypto capital of the world,‚Äù and stated that it could bring cryptocurrency further into the mainstream. The vote to invoke cloture sets the stage for full debate and a potential floor vote, which could send the bill to the House of Representatives if it passes. Thune acknowledged that there is still a lot more work to be done regarding digital asset regulation. Senate Majority Leader John Thune However, not all lawmakers are on board. Senator Elizabeth Warren voiced her strong opposition, and criticized the Senate for failing to consider key bipartisan amendments. She warned that the GENIUS Act contains major flaws, including weak consumer protections and national security safeguards. Warren also raised ethical concerns tied to Trump‚Äôs personal involvement in the crypto sector through his family-backed platform, World Liberty Financial. She accused the president of using crypto incentives, including dinners and privileged access, as tools to solicit support from foreign governments and wealthy donors in exchange for political favors like pardons and tariff exemptions. President Donald Trump and David Sacks While many Democrats supported advancing the bill, it is still uncertain whether it will secure enough backing for final passage, particularly in a chamber where Republicans have only a narrow majority. After the bill‚Äôs initial failure to advance in May, Trump‚Äôs top crypto advisor, David Sacks, expressed confidence that the GENIUS Act will eventually pass with bipartisan support. Meanwhile, the House version of stablecoin legislation, the STABLE Act, continues to undergo scrutiny in the Financial Services Committee. CLARITY Act Heads to Full House Vote The US House Committee on Financial Services also recently voted to advance the Digital Asset Market Clarity (CLARITY) Act, which is a major legislative proposal with the goal of establishing a comprehensive framework for crypto market regulation. With a 32-19 vote on Tuesday, the bill now heads to the full House of Representatives for consideration, after a prior 47-6 approval from the House Agriculture Committee. This dual-committee approval is a key milestone in congressional efforts to clarify regulatory oversight of the digital asset space. The CLARITY Act is designed to delineate the responsibilities of the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) and the Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) in overseeing the crypto industry. It introduces provisional registration requirements for digital asset platforms, including crypto exchanges and broker-dealers, while also mandating adherence to disclosure rules, customer asset segregation, and recordkeeping standards. The legislation specifically includes protections for users, like the right to hold assets in non-custodial wallets and to conduct peer-to-peer transactions without interference. Representative French Hill, who sponsored the bill , believes that it will create a fair and forward-looking regulatory environment that includes all participants in the crypto ecosystem. He described it as a foundational step for American leadership in Web3 technologies and tokenized financial services. Crypto Subcommittee Chairman Bryan Steil , who previously led a stablecoin bill, is excited about the progress that was made, and called the latest vote a huge achievement. Hill also introduced an amendment that seeks to protect non-controlling blockchain developers from being classified as money transmitters, shielding them from certain regulatory burdens that could stifle innovation. Despite the progress, some Democrats voiced concerns. Representative Maxine Waters proposed changes that are aimed at preventing potential conflicts of interest tied to President Donald Trump‚Äôs crypto ventures. She believes that the legislation could be used to benefit Trump and his family. Representative Brad Sherman introduced a separate amendment seeking to prohibit potential industry bailouts, due to skepticism from some lawmakers about broader industry incentives. The bill now awaits debate and a vote on the House floor. Lawmaker Presses SEC Over ETH Status In other regulatory news, Republican Representative William Timmons formally requested that US SEC Chair Paul Atkins release internal documents with detail about the agency‚Äôs historical stance on Ethereum (ETH) under previous leadership, particularly during Gary Gensler‚Äôs tenure. In a letter that was submitted Tuesday, Timmons urged transparency regarding the SEC‚Äôs shifting views on whether ETH qualifies as a security. This very question has long been a point of contention for both regulators and the crypto community. Part of William Timmons‚Äô letter Timmons argued that the SEC under Gensler failed to provide a consistent or coherent regulatory framework for digital assets, and he mentioned Ethereum as a prime example. He pointed to 2018 remarks by former SEC Director of Corporate Finance William Hinman, who publicly stated that ETH and Bitcoin should not be classified as securities. In contrast, Timmons claimed that Gensler, as SEC Chair, consistently avoided confirming ETH‚Äôs status during congressional hearings.Timmons specifically cited a hearing in April of 2023 where Gensler declined to clarify ETH‚Äôs classification, despite the fact that the SEC reportedly approved an investigation into ETH‚Äôs status just days earlier. The situation became even more complex in 2024 when the SEC approved spot Ether exchange-traded funds (ETFs), a move that would typically imply that ETH is not considered a security. Just weeks after the ETF approvals, the SEC officially closed its investigation into ETH. According to Timmons, this series of contradictory actions caused a lot of confusion among investors and market participants, which undermined regulatory confidence in the US crypto space. Timmons' letter adds political pressure to an already ongoing legal battle involving Coinbase. In 2023, the exchange filed a Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) request seeking access to SEC documents on ETH. When the SEC denied the request, Coinbase initiated legal action, which resulted in a court ruling requiring the SEC to release certain records. Some of these disclosed documents were later published by Coinbase, and revealed that even federal prosecutors were unable to obtain a clear stance from the SEC on Ethereum‚Äôs regulatory status.

title: Bitcoin Maximalist Admits XRP and Solana Are Becoming New Financial Base Layer
body: In a recent panel discussion shared by Xaif (@Xaif_Crypto), four industry figures‚ÄîDave Weisberger, President of BetterTrade.digital; Tillman Holloway, CEO of Arch Public Inc.; Andrew Parish, co-founder of Arch Public Inc.; and Joshua Frank, CEO of The Tie‚Äîexamined the emerging roles of digital assets, including XRP and Solana. Xaif shared a snippet of the discussion where Weisberger spoke about the real, scalable function of cryptocurrencies beyond speculation. He explored how certain cryptocurrencies are positioning themselves as core infrastructure for global financial systems. Weisberger, known for his Bitcoin maximalist stance, acknowledged that the value of these assets ultimately depends on utility, not narrative. :Bitcoin maxis himself says The future is being built now on $XRP XRP is emerging as the base layer for global payments Positioned beyond memes‚Äîreal infrastructure Could underlie stablecoins like RLUSD, Chasecoin, and even JPMorgan‚Äôs token Interoperability with‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/8zmGfLm8Ap ‚Äî ùïèaif | (@Xaif_Crypto) June 10, 2025 Targeting Global Payments and Trade He identified XRP and Solana as key contenders in this shift. XRP is aligning itself with cross-border payments, while Solana is gaining traction in trading systems. According to Weisberger, both are ‚Äúvying to be the base layer to support new transaction modalities.‚Äù If these platforms enable real-world financial activity more efficiently than existing systems, they will increase in value. Currently, the financial ecosystem relies on centralized exchanges and proprietary systems. XRP and Solana represent a move toward decentralized, programmable alternatives. XRP, in particular, is targeting the payments space, with the potential to overthrow systems like SWIFT . Weisberger noted that if XRP underlies the stablecoins that become part of global financial infrastructure, such as RLUSD, or even stablecoins from major banks like Chase Coin, or JPMorgan‚Äôs token, it would gain long-term value. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 However, adoption is key to this long-term growth, as Weisberger noted that without adoption at that scale, the asset cannot gain this long-term value. Utility Will Decide Longevity Solana, while often associated with retail-level activity such as meme coins , is increasingly positioned as a platform capable of supporting broader trading infrastructure. ‚ÄúIf Solana broadens beyond memes to trading of everything,‚Äù Weisberger said, its value could rise significantly. The key, once again, is utility. While Ethereum was briefly mentioned in similar terms for its role in tokenization, the focus remained on XRP and Solana due to their specific paths toward becoming integral to payments and trading, respectively. Each is carving out a potential role in an ecosystem that demands efficiency, scalability, and interoperability. As the financial sector increasingly experiments with blockchain-based solutions, the underlying infrastructure will matter more than hype cycles. Whether institutions choose XRP to underlie stablecoins and transform global payments or adopt Solana, the utility of the underlying technology will be the defining factor. title: U.S matches its largest Treasury buyback in history with another $10B debt redemption
body: The U.S. government bought back another $10 billion of its debt through the Treasury Department on June 10. The Treasury‚Äôs latest move has matched the largest buyback of its bonds in history from June 3, with its previous largest buyback being in 2000, at approximately $3 billion. According to the Bureau of the Fiscal Service, the Treasury also repurchased the full amount of its maximum target for the operation on June 3, which was capped at $10 billion, out of a total of $22.87 billion in par value offered by market participants. The maximum per value offered by market participants for redemption in the latest buyback was $18.1 billion. Treasury matches the largest buyback in history üö® United States Treasury üö® THEY DID IT AGAIN! U.S. Treasury just bought back another $10 Billion of its own debt, matching the largest Treasury buyback in history (and that was from last week)! pic.twitter.com/OxyvDWWV76 ‚Äî {Matt} $XRPatriot (@matttttt187) June 12, 2025 The department acknowledged that the previous June 3 $10 billion buyback initiative was designed to repurchase securities maturing between July 15th and May 31st, 2027. Buybacks allow the Treasury to retire outstanding debt early, potentially reducing interest costs and adjusting its debt profile. The department‚Äôs June 10 operation hit its $10 billion maximum buyback target, where of the 40 eligible issues, 18 were accepted in the buyback, demonstrating significant market participation and investor willingness to offload mid-term Treasury notes. In last week‚Äôs buyback, the Treasury also revealed that of the 40 eligible issues, 22 were accepted in the repurchase. The repurchase arrived at a crucial moment for U.S. fiscal policy. It could signal new approaches to managing the federal government‚Äôs $34 trillion national debt load amid changing economic conditions, rising interest rates, and global investor sentiment. The country‚Äôs interest payments on that debt are also expected to top $1 trillion annually by 2026 if current trends continue. The government‚Äôs current debt has raised concerns among both policymakers and investors regarding the structural balance of the federal budget. Former Treasury official Martin Keller said the buybacks are not just about reducing numbers on a spreadsheet but about reestablishing confidence in the government‚Äôs ability to manage its obligations and create smoother functioning in the capital markets. ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs a clear macroeconomic logic to this. With the Federal Reserve signaling a potential pause in rate hikes, the Treasury may be trying to create a breathing room in the secondary market and reduce crowding from short-term issuance.‚Äù -Elaine Parker, Senior Economist at the Brookings Institution. A Treasury spokesperson mentioned that the department was committed to managing the nation‚Äôs finances with both short-term flexibility and long-term sustainability. According to the department‚Äôs spokesperson, the buyback is part of the U.S.‚Äôs strategic debt management approach to ensure smoother market operations and reduce future borrowing costs. Jamie Liu, managing director at Capital Horizons Group, argued that the buybacks may not alter the debt trajectory in the near term unless it is followed by a series of similar actions or a broader structural plan. Treasury evaluates future buybacks for future executions According to Jeff Gundlach, Scott Bessent discussed extending maturities and lowering coupons on Treasuries held abroad. This is tantamount to a default. The fact that a sitting U.S. Treasury Secretary is speaking publicly about default should cause foreigners to dump Treasuries. ‚Äî Peter Schiff (@PeterSchiff) May 7, 2025 In an April interview with Bloomberg, Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent dismissed concerns about foreign countries fueling a bond market selloff, pointing instead to investors unwinding leveraged positions. He also called out the Treasury‚Äôs ability to increase its buyback program if necessary. When asked whether he‚Äôs discussing concerns about the stability of the Treasury market with Powell, Bessent also dismissed the notion that there‚Äôs any cause for alarm. The repurchase of bonds comes as rising yields increase borrowing costs, with Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell continuing to keep interest rates higher for longer. At the time of publication, the 10-year Treasury yield is currently at 4.405%, while the 2-year Treasury yield is at 3.937%. Median forecasts from nearly 50 bond strategists in a June 6-11 Reuters survey predicted the 10-year yield would decline a modest 13 basis points to 4.35% in three months and to 4.29% in six months. The survey also showed that the more interest rate-sensitive 2-year yield was forecast to decline a slightly steeper 17 basis points to 3.85% in three months and to 3.73 by the end of November. Additional buybacks are being evaluated for future execution, depending on market conditions and fiscal developments, according to Treasury sources. The U.S. government has also not yet confirmed if debt redemptions will become a regular feature of its debt management strategy. Cryptopolitan Academy: Want to grow your money in 2025? Learn how to do it with DeFi in our upcoming webclass. Save Your Spot

title: Trade Tariffs: US Treasury Secretary Hints at Potential Negotiation Deadline Extension, What‚Äôs the Impact on Crypto?
body: BitcoinWorld Trade Tariffs: US Treasury Secretary Hints at Potential Negotiation Deadline Extension, What‚Äôs the Impact on Crypto? In a move that could signal shifting tides in international commerce, U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent has indicated that the Trade Tariffs negotiation deadline for certain countries, initially set for July 9, may be extended. This announcement injects a degree of flexibility into ongoing discussions that have significant implications, not just for traditional markets but potentially for the volatile world of cryptocurrency as well. For those navigating the digital asset space, understanding these broader economic signals is paramount. Why Does a Trade Tariffs Negotiation Deadline Extension Matter? Trade tariffs are essentially taxes imposed on imported goods. They are used by countries for various reasons, including protecting domestic industries, generating revenue, or as a tool in foreign policy negotiations. When tariffs are high or trade relationships are uncertain, it creates friction in the Global Economy . Businesses face higher costs, consumers may see increased prices, and overall economic activity can slow down. The original Negotiation Deadline of July 9 was a critical point. Failure to reach an agreement by this date could have led to the imposition of new tariffs or the escalation of existing ones. An extension, as suggested by the US Treasury Secretary , doesn‚Äôt necessarily mean a deal is imminent, but it does suggest a willingness to continue dialogue rather than immediately resorting to protectionist measures. This prolonged period of negotiation can lead to: Continued uncertainty for businesses planning supply chains and investments. Potential for markets to react positively to de-escalation hopes or negatively to prolonged indecision. A window for diplomatic solutions to be explored more fully. The Broader Global Economy Picture Trade policies are fundamental pillars of the Global Economy . Interconnected supply chains mean that tariffs imposed by one country can have ripple effects across the world. For example, a tariff on raw materials could increase manufacturing costs in another country, impacting their exports. Uncertainty surrounding trade agreements can lead companies to delay investment decisions, further dampening economic growth. Economists closely watch trade negotiations because they are indicators of international cooperation and economic stability. Positive developments can boost confidence, while breakdowns can trigger volatility. The statement from the US Treasury Secretary is being scrutinized for clues about the health of international trade relations and the potential path forward. What is the Potential Crypto Market Impact? The cryptocurrency market, while often driven by its own unique dynamics like technological advancements, adoption rates, and regulatory news, does not exist in a vacuum. It is increasingly influenced by macroeconomic factors and global market sentiment. Developments regarding Trade Tariffs and the stability of the Global Economy can have a tangible Crypto Market Impact . Here‚Äôs how the potential extension of the Negotiation Deadline and the broader trade picture could affect crypto: Risk Appetite: Global economic uncertainty often leads investors to become more risk-averse. They might move away from assets perceived as higher risk, like cryptocurrencies, towards safer havens such as government bonds or gold. Conversely, signs of de-escalation or stability in trade talks could increase risk appetite, potentially benefiting crypto. Inflation and Monetary Policy: Tariffs can contribute to inflation by increasing the cost of imported goods. Central banks might react to inflationary pressures by adjusting interest rates. Changes in monetary policy, particularly by major central banks like the U.S. Federal Reserve, have historically had a significant impact on the crypto market. USD Strength: Trade tensions can influence the strength of the U.S. dollar. A stronger dollar can sometimes put downward pressure on Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies, which are often priced in USD. Investor Confidence: Positive news on trade negotiations, even just an extension indicating ongoing talks, can boost overall investor confidence in the stability of the global financial system. This confidence can sometimes spill over into alternative asset classes like crypto. The statement by the US Treasury Secretary , while not directly about crypto, adds another layer to the complex macroeconomic environment that crypto investors must consider. Navigating Uncertainty: Actionable Insights for Crypto Investors Given the potential for market fluctuations based on global economic news like the Trade Tariffs situation, what can crypto investors do? Stay Informed: Pay attention to major economic announcements, not just crypto-specific news. Global trade developments, inflation data, and central bank decisions are crucial. Understand Correlation: Observe how Bitcoin and other major cryptocurrencies react to significant shifts in traditional markets and economic indicators. While not always perfectly correlated, the relationship is growing. Diversify: Don‚Äôt put all your eggs in one basket. Consider diversifying within the crypto space (different assets, sectors) and across different asset classes based on your risk tolerance. Long-Term Perspective: For many, crypto is a long-term investment. Short-term volatility driven by macroeconomic news might be less concerning if you have a long-term investment horizon. Risk Management: Use tools like stop-losses and avoid over-leveraging, especially during periods of high uncertainty driven by global events. The potential extension of the Negotiation Deadline provides a brief pause, but the underlying issues related to Trade Tariffs remain. The reaction of the Global Economy and its subsequent Crypto Market Impact will depend on the progress and eventual outcome of these ongoing discussions. Conclusion: Keeping an Eye on the Horizon The indication from US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent that the Trade Tariffs Negotiation Deadline might be pushed past July 9 is a notable development in the ongoing saga of international trade relations. It highlights the complex interplay of global politics and economics. While this news might seem distant from the world of Bitcoin and altcoins, its potential impact on the Global Economy is undeniable, and macroeconomic shifts increasingly influence the Crypto Market Impact . Whether this extension leads to a breakthrough or simply prolongs uncertainty remains to be seen. For those invested in the digital future, staying informed about these broader economic signals is essential for making well-rounded decisions in a connected world. To learn more about the latest global economic trends and their impact on the crypto market , explore our articles on key developments shaping Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies price action. This post Trade Tariffs: US Treasury Secretary Hints at Potential Negotiation Deadline Extension, What‚Äôs the Impact on Crypto? first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Binance Now Live in Syria After Sanctions Lifted
body: The post Binance Now Live in Syria After Sanctions Lifted appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News After many years of being shut out from the global crypto space, Syrian residents can now finally use Binance, one of the world‚Äôs biggest crypto platforms. This happened because the U.S. removed some sanctions on Syria. Making this a big turning point for millions of users who were once left on the sidelines of the digital economy. Binance Opens Doors For Syrian Residents For a long time, Syrians had to watch from a distance as the crypto industry grew rapidly across the world. The local currency lost value, and many people had to depend on money sent from family members living abroad. Some even turned to crypto to protect their savings. But they couldn‚Äôt use major platforms like Binance due to the sanctions. That all changes now. With the restrictions lifted, Binance has removed Syria from its list of prohibited countries. This move doesn‚Äôt just reopen access, it signals a fresh start for Syrians who can now use crypto tools to improve their financial lives. Binance even says it will help new Syrian users through educational tools and support in Arabic. Their goal is to make sure everyone can use crypto easily and safely. What Syrians Can Do Now on Binance With the ban lifted, Syrian users can now tap into the full suite of Binance services, from spot and futures trading to staking, stablecoins, and even Binance Pay for cross-border payments. The platform has also introduced Arabic educational resources to help new users learn how to navigate crypto safely and confidently. Whether it‚Äôs buying Bitcoin, sending USDT to family abroad, or earning yield on crypto holdings, Syrians can now do it all within Binance‚Äôs secure environment ‚Äî just like the rest of the world‚Äôs 270 million users. Crypto Interest Was Already High in Syria Even before these U.S. sanctions, Syria ranked high in crypto-related internet searches. That shows how interested people already were in learning about digital currencies. Many just needed a safe and legal way to get started. Now they finally have that chance.

title: A Historic Turning Point for Bitcoin in Germany: The First Step Has Been Taken
body: Germany-based natural cosmetics company Evertz Pharma GmbH has become the first German company to adopt the strategic Bitcoin reserve model. The company expanded its treasury reserves by purchasing 100 Bitcoins worth approximately 10 million euros (about $10.8 million) in May 2025. Evertz Pharma‚Äôs interest in Bitcoin is not new. The company began accumulating BTC in December 2020 with its first purchase of ‚Ç¨2 million, and has since been building a digital reserve by regularly allocating a portion of its profits to Bitcoin. The company‚Äôs General Manager, Dominik Evertz, said in a statement on the subject: ‚ÄúIn line with our mission to promote science-based natural beauty, we act with a forward-looking mindset. With its rarity and global tradability, BTC complements our reserve strategy and strengthens our company‚Äôs long-term resilience.‚Äù Related News: BREAKING: Coinbase Unleashes Listing Storm - Announcements Coming One After Another - Here's the Latest Altcoin They've Chosen With the latest purchase of 100 BTC, Evertz Pharma stands out from its competitors in the sector and traditional treasury management practices. ‚ÄúWe will continue to purchase Bitcoin with our company profits and are constantly evaluating new ways to sustainably increase our assets,‚Äù said Group CFO Tobias Evertz. Unlike BTC investors like Strategy or Metaplanet, which are publicly traded companies, Evertz Pharma operates as a private German company. Dominik Evertz argued that Bitcoin is not just an investment vehicle, but also a strategic asset that complements the company‚Äôs vision of stability and sustainability. He noted that Bitcoin also offers a hedge against inflation and capital preservation without the storage difficulties of traditional assets like gold. *This is not investment advice. title: XRP Could Handle 14% of SWIFT Transactions, Says Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse
body: The post XRP Could Handle 14% of SWIFT Transactions, Says Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News XRP could be gearing up for a massive price breakout, potentially hitting double digits, if Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse‚Äôs bold forecast becomes reality. Speaking at the XRP APEX 2025 event in Singapore, Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse projected that XRP could handle 14% of SWIFT‚Äôs global transaction volume within the next five years. The key, he says, lies in liquidity‚Äînot messaging. BOOOOOOOOOM @bgarlinghouse predicts XRP could capture 14% of SWIFT volume in just 5 years. That‚Äôs $1.4 TRILLION+ in annual cross-border payments. Don‚Äôt fade $XRP . pic.twitter.com/4rYv0hgsoI ‚Äî EDO FARINA üÖß XRP (@edward_farina) June 11, 2025 Why 14% of SWIFT Volume Matters SWIFT handles a massive chunk of global financial transactions, estimated at around $150 trillion per year. Garlinghouse emphasized that while SWIFT is known for messaging, the real value lies in liquidity which is the actual movement of money. That‚Äôs where XRP fits in as a bridge asset, designed to facilitate instant cross-border payments. If XRPL captures 14% of SWIFT‚Äôs volume, that would mean $21 trillion flowing through the ledger annually. But XRP doesn‚Äôt need to store this full amount. Instead, its value depends on how quickly the same tokens circulate through the system. This ‚Äú token velocity ‚Äù determines how much XRP needs to be locked up at any time to handle global flows. XRP‚Äôs Current Standing At the moment, XRP is ranked fourth on CoinMarketCap with a $136 billion market cap. The token is trading at $2.31 after modest gains this week. With institutions showing more interest in blockchain-based solutions, XRP is gaining new attention as a serious player in cross-border finance. Ripple and SWIFT Rumors There have also been talks of a potential collaboration, or even replacement, between Ripple and SWIFT. Garlinghouse hinted at the idea earlier this year, and a former SWIFT employee claimed that banks have tested XRP‚Äôs compatibility with the SWIFT system.

title: Semler Scientific: Why Tom Lee Sees Unexpected Opportunity in This Bitcoin Treasury Stock‚Äôs Deep NAV Discount
body: BitcoinWorld Semler Scientific: Why Tom Lee Sees Unexpected Opportunity in This Bitcoin Treasury Stock‚Äôs Deep NAV Discount In the ever-evolving landscape of cryptocurrency investments, sometimes the most intriguing opportunities appear in unexpected places. Case in point: Semler Scientific (SMLR) . This medical technology firm recently made headlines by pivoting towards a Bitcoin treasury stock strategy, accumulating a significant amount of the digital asset on its balance sheet. However, its journey hasn‚Äôt been without turbulence, presenting a fascinating puzzle for investors. Semler Scientific‚Äôs Bold Pivot: Becoming a Bitcoin Treasury Stock Traditionally known for providing innovative products and services to healthcare providers, Semler Scientific took a decisive step into the world of digital assets. Recognizing Bitcoin‚Äôs potential as a store of value and a hedge against inflation, the company began converting its cash reserves into BTC. This strategic shift transformed Semler Scientific from a pure medical tech play into something hybrid ‚Äì a medical technology company with a substantial Bitcoin treasury. This move places it alongside a growing, albeit still small, group of publicly traded companies that hold Bitcoin as a primary treasury reserve asset, effectively making it a Bitcoin treasury stock . This strategy offers investors indirect exposure to Bitcoin through traditional stock markets. Instead of buying BTC directly or through complex instruments, investors can purchase shares of companies like Semler, whose value is increasingly tied to their Bitcoin holdings. It‚Äôs a strategy that appeals to some institutional investors and those who prefer the regulatory familiarity of equity markets. Unpacking the Current Situation: The Significant BTC NAV Discount Despite its significant Bitcoin holdings, Semler Scientific‚Äôs stock has faced considerable pressure recently. The company‚Äôs share price has experienced a notable decline, leading to a situation where its market capitalization is now significantly lower than the value of its Bitcoin assets alone. This phenomenon is known as trading at a BTC NAV discount . Let‚Äôs break down the numbers as reported: Bitcoin Holdings: 4,449 BTC Approximate Value of BTC Holdings: Around $491 million (based on reported figures) Current Market Capitalization (SMLR stock): Around $420 million Discount Ratio: Trading at approximately 0.859x its Bitcoin Net Asset Value (NAV) What does a 0.859x BTC NAV discount mean? It means that for every dollar‚Äôs worth of Bitcoin the company holds, the market is valuing the entire company (including its medical tech business) at only about 86 cents. This deep discount highlights a significant divergence between the intrinsic value represented by the Bitcoin on the balance sheet and the market‚Äôs current perception of the company‚Äôs overall worth. This situation also presents a challenge for Semler‚Äôs corporate strategy. When a company‚Äôs stock trades below its NAV, issuing new shares to raise capital becomes dilutive. This is because selling shares at a price below the value of the underlying assets per share effectively reduces the NAV per share for existing shareholders. Under these conditions, Semler can no longer issue shares accretively (i.e., in a way that increases the NAV per share), limiting one potential avenue for growth or capital raising. Why Does Tom Lee Remain Bullish on SMLR Stock? In the face of this stock underperformance and the seemingly disadvantageous trading position, one prominent voice remains notably optimistic: Fundstrat‚Äôs head of research, Tom Lee . Known for his often bullish stance on Bitcoin and the broader market, Lee has included Semler Scientific in his curated list of investment opportunities, specifically within his ‚ÄúGranny Shot‚Äù portfolio. What is the ‚ÄúGranny Shot‚Äù portfolio? It‚Äôs a concept Lee uses to highlight unconventional or overlooked investment ideas that possess significant potential upside, often involving unique situations or strategies not widely appreciated by the mainstream market. By including SMLR stock in this portfolio, Tom Lee signals his belief that despite the current challenges and the deep BTC NAV discount , there are underlying factors that make Semler an attractive, albeit perhaps non-obvious, investment. Tom Lee‚Äôs bullishness likely stems from several potential factors: Deep Value Play: The significant discount to NAV could be seen as a mispricing by the market, offering an opportunity to buy assets (the Bitcoin) at a discount through the stock. Leverage to Bitcoin Price: As a Bitcoin treasury stock , Semler offers leveraged exposure to potential increases in the price of Bitcoin. If BTC‚Äôs value rises, the value of Semler‚Äôs holdings increases proportionally, which could eventually narrow the discount and boost the stock price. Belief in the Core Business: While the Bitcoin treasury aspect is key, Tom Lee might also see underlying value or future potential in Semler‚Äôs core medical technology business, which the market is currently heavily discounting due to the focus on the Bitcoin play. Potential for Corporate Action: A significant NAV discount can sometimes trigger corporate actions aimed at closing the gap, such as share buybacks (if the company has free cash flow from its operations) or strategic adjustments. For Tom Lee , Semler Scientific appears to represent a classic ‚Äúvalue trap‚Äù turned potential opportunity ‚Äì a situation where an asset is trading below its perceived intrinsic value, waiting for a catalyst to unlock that value. Challenges and Considerations for Semler Scientific While the deep discount might look appealing on paper, it‚Äôs crucial to understand the challenges Semler Scientific faces: Market Perception: Investors may be hesitant about a medical tech company diversifying so heavily into a volatile asset like Bitcoin, leading to uncertainty and a lower valuation multiple compared to either pure tech or pure Bitcoin plays. Operational Cash Flow: The ability to leverage the Bitcoin holdings or close the discount might depend on the profitability and cash flow generation of the core medical tech business. If the core business struggles, it limits financial flexibility. Bitcoin Price Volatility: While a rising BTC price is a tailwind, a falling price exacerbates the situation, potentially widening the discount and further pressuring the stock. Inability to Issue Accretively: As mentioned, trading below NAV makes issuing shares for expansion or acquisitions disadvantageous, hindering a common corporate finance tool. These factors contribute to the discount and represent real hurdles that Semler must navigate. Is SMLR Stock a Hidden Gem or a Value Trap? This is the central question for investors considering Semler Scientific. The deep BTC NAV discount , coupled with Tom Lee ‚Äòs endorsement, presents a compelling case for potential upside. It offers leveraged exposure to Bitcoin in a potentially undervalued package. However, the discount exists for reasons. The market is clearly assigning a lower value to the combination of the medical tech business and the Bitcoin treasury than the sum of their parts. Investors must weigh whether the current challenges are temporary headwinds or structural issues that will persist. Key questions for potential investors: Do you believe in the long-term value proposition of Bitcoin? Do you see potential for the discount to narrow over time, either through a rising Bitcoin price, improved performance in the core business, or strategic corporate actions? Are you comfortable with the volatility associated with both a small-cap stock and Bitcoin? Semler Scientific is not a low-risk investment. It‚Äôs a speculative play that combines the uncertainties of a niche medical tech business with the volatility of cryptocurrency markets. Tom Lee‚Äôs bullish view provides a notable perspective, but it‚Äôs essential for investors to conduct their own thorough research and understand the risks involved. Conclusion: A Bullish Endorsement Amidst the Discount Semler Scientific‚Äôs transformation into a Bitcoin treasury stock has created a unique investment scenario. Trading at a significant BTC NAV discount , the company faces clear challenges, including a recent sharp decline in its SMLR stock price and limitations on issuing shares accretively. Yet, prominent figures like Tom Lee see beyond the current struggles, viewing the deep discount as an potential opportunity within his ‚ÄúGranny Shot‚Äù investment framework. Whether Semler can successfully navigate its challenges, leverage its Bitcoin holdings, and ultimately see its market valuation align more closely with its underlying assets remains to be seen. For investors intrigued by the intersection of traditional markets and cryptocurrency, Semler Scientific offers a complex, high-risk, high-reward proposition worth watching closely. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action. title: Ethereum Breaks Out With Clear Path to $3,400: Analysts
body: Following months of lethargy, Ethereum analysis and price predictions are coming thick and fast as the asset has gained around 60% since the beginning of May. Ethereum has broken out of a month-long consolidation range, with key technical levels now defined by investor cost basis distribution, as reported by Glassnode on June 11. Strong support exists between $2,700 and $2,760, where more than 2 million ETH is held by investors who accumulated during the recent consolidation period. This creates a potential floor for the price, it noted. #Ethereum just broke out of a month-long range. Cost Basis Distribution shows 1.3M $ETH held around $2.70K and $2.74K, and 800K #ETH at $2.76K. These investors accumulated during consolidation and now will potentially form a strong support zone. pic.twitter.com/X6zQRnzIyF ‚Äî glassnode (@glassnode) June 11, 2025 Ethereum Clear for Move to $3,400 Above current levels, resistance is relatively light and evenly distributed up to around $3,400, where the first significant resistance appears. If the current support zone holds, ETH has a clear technical path to $3,420, it noted. However, the speed of any rally will depend on how holders in the $2,800 to $3,300 range react to price increases, analysts said. Meanwhile, Santiment reported that social sentiment for Ethereum was increasing, which implies greater retail interest. ‚ÄúTwitter discussions emphasize Ethereum‚Äôs market activity, price surges, derivatives trading, institutional adoption, and bullish sentiment, reflecting strong trading volumes and strategic analysis involving ETH.‚Äù Crypto analyst ‚ÄòRekt Capital‚Äô observed that ETH retested $2,500 as support for a rally to $4,000 in August 2021 and then again in early 2024. ‚ÄúFor the past five weeks, ETH has been successfully retesting $2,500 as support,‚Äù they noted.¬†The analyst also noted that Ethereum dominance has reached 10% in an uptrend for the first time since March 2020. Meanwhile, institutions are still loading up with 18 straight days of inflows into spot Ether ETFs. Wednesday saw the highest inflow since early February, with $240 million entering the products. ‚ÄúAnd there‚Äôs still no staking or in-kind creations and redemptions,‚Äù exclaimed ETF Store President Nate Geraci. 18 straight days of inflows into spot eth ETFs‚Ä¶ Nearly $250mil just today. And there‚Äôs still no staking or in-kind creations & redemptions. So early. ‚Äî Nate Geraci (@NateGeraci) June 12, 2025 Elsewhere on Crypto Markets Ethereum hit an intraday and four-and-a-half-month high of $2,870 in late trading on June 11 before correcting to $2,760 during trading in Asia on Thursday morning. Bitcoin was retreating from its weekly top of $110,000 and had fallen back below $108,000 at the time of writing. Altcoins were in the red with larger losses for Solana, Dogecoin, Tron, Cardano, Sui, Chainlink, and Avalanche, wiping out recent gains . title: Bitcoin-Based Stablecoin Network Plasma Raises Deposit Cap to $1B, Gets Filled in 30 Minutes
body: Stablecoin-focused blockchain Plasma raised its deposit cap to $1 billion early Thursday ‚Äî and hit that limit within 30 minutes. The new cap marks a doubling from the prior $500 million ceiling, which had itself been raised just days earlier following a community-driven outcry over bot activity and rapid sellout times. Plasma said the short-notice announcement was designed to give real users, such as those active in its Discord, a fairer shot at joining. But it‚Äôs not a token sale just yet. ‚ÄúDeposits are not the sale itself,‚Äù Plasma clarified in a post. ‚ÄúAll funds remain fully owned by depositors and will be bridged to Plasma mainnet beta.‚Äù Participants earn the right to buy into the eventual $50 million XPL public sale based on how many units they‚Äôve locked up by the cutoff. The sale is valued at $500 million on a fully diluted basis. Earlier this week, the project ‚Äî which aims to bring native stablecoin functionality to Bitcoin through an EVM-compatible sidechain ‚Äî saw its initial $500 million cap fill in just five minutes , according to Arkham data. That figure was ten times what Plasma initially planned, indicative of massive investor appetite for stablecoin infrastructure. The team behind Plasma has positioned its chain as a way to sidestep Ethereum‚Äôs high fees and congestion by building a zero-gas environment for stablecoin transactions while being anchored to Bitcoin‚Äôs security model. USDT will be the first supported asset, with more expected to follow. Read more: Plasma‚Äôs XPL Token Sale Attracts $500M as Investors Chase Stablecoin Plays

title: World Economic Forum Confirms $1 Billion Fund on XRP Ledger
body: A new report by the World Economic Forum (WEF), titled Asset Tokenization in Financial Markets, directly references a major development involving the XRP Ledger (XRPL) in the tokenized private equity (PE) space. The inclusion was highlighted by digital finance analyst WrathofKahneman in a recent tweet, drawing attention to a case study from the report, which showcases the integration of blockchain infrastructure in institutional investment. The report identifies Aurum Equity Partners as the firm behind what is described as the world‚Äôs first combined private equity and debt tokenized fund, valued at $1 billion. According to the document, this fund was launched on the XRP Ledger, an open-source decentralized layer-1 blockchain. The purpose of this initiative is to support data center investments, improving investor access and enabling liquidity via secondary markets. WEF report, "Asset Tokenization in Financial Markets" mentions #XRPL use for Aurum's "combined PE and debt tokenized fund valued at $1b," to drive datacenter investment. #Ripple (Infranger) is a contributor to WEF. pic.twitter.com/XoqhEbaWy4 ‚Äî WrathofKahneman (@WKahneman) June 9, 2025 Tokenization‚Äôs Role in Modernizing Private Equity The specific mention of the XRP Ledger in a WEF publication lends further visibility to the blockchain‚Äôs expanding use case within regulated financial instruments. The report discusses broader benefits of tokenization across the private equity market, including improved transparency, operational efficiency, and enhanced accessibility. It frames the Aurum Equity Partners case as a pioneering example of how distributed ledger technology can be utilized to digitize traditionally illiquid assets such as private equity and debt instruments. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 The document also notes that the private equity market, valued at $5.3 trillion in 2023, is projected to grow to $7 trillion by 2030, with a significant portion expected to be tokenized. Within this context, the Aurum initiative serves as a practical demonstration of tokenization‚Äôs real-world application. The fund‚Äôs structure on XRPL is intended to facilitate increased participation by investors and reduce traditional barriers associated with private equity markets, such as high minimum investments and limited liquidity. Ripple‚Äôs Connection to the WEF and XRPL Ecosystem WrathofKahneman, in his tweet , also pointed out Ripple‚Äôs indirect association with the initiative through its role as a contributor to the WEF. Ripple, the enterprise blockchain company behind significant development on XRPL, has frequently participated in policy dialogues and reports published by the Forum . Although the report does not reference Ripple directly in connection with the Aurum fund, its ongoing involvement with the WEF signals institutional acknowledgment of blockchain platforms linked to the company. As interest in tokenization accelerates globally, the Aurum Equity Partners initiative and its recognition in WEF‚Äôs latest report may serve as a precedent for further adoption of decentralized ledger technology in capital markets. Disclaimer : This content is meant to inform and should not be considered financial advice. The views expressed in this article may include the author‚Äôs personal opinions and do not represent Times Tabloid‚Äôs opinion. Readers are advised to conduct thorough research before making any investment decisions. Any action taken by the reader is strictly at their own risk. Times Tabloid is not responsible for any financial losses. title: Crucial US Stablecoin Regulation Bill, GENIUS Act, Faces Final Senate Vote Next Week
body: BitcoinWorld Crucial US Stablecoin Regulation Bill, GENIUS Act, Faces Final Senate Vote Next Week The landscape of crypto regulation US is on the cusp of a potentially transformative moment. A significant piece of stablecoin legislation, known as the GENIUS Act, has just cleared a critical hurdle in the U.S. Senate and is now set for a final vote next week. This development could reshape how stablecoins operate within the United States, impacting everything from innovation to consumer protection. Understanding the Path of the US Stablecoin Regulation Bill For those following the evolving rules around digital assets, the progress of any major stablecoin bill is big news. This particular bill, the GENIUS Act, recently saw the U.S. Senate take a decisive step. They voted 68-30 to invoke cloture on the bill. What does invoking cloture mean? Essentially, it‚Äôs a parliamentary procedure used in the Senate to end debate and proceed to a vote. This successful cloture vote signals strong bipartisan support, or at least a desire to move the process forward, clearing the way for a final vote on the bill‚Äôs passage. The final vote is currently scheduled for next Monday. Key Provisions of the GENIUS Act: What Does This Stablecoin Legislation Propose? The GENIUS Act isn‚Äôt just a general statement about stablecoins; it lays out specific requirements aimed at bringing clarity and stability to the sector. Understanding these details is crucial for anyone involved with or interested in the future of digital finance in the U.S. Here are some of the core requirements proposed by the bill: Licensing Requirements: The bill mandates that entities wishing to issue stablecoins must obtain a specific license. This moves stablecoin issuance from a less regulated space into a framework requiring formal approval and oversight. 100% Reserve Requirements: A cornerstone of the bill is the requirement for stablecoin issuers to maintain reserves equal to 100% of the value of the stablecoins they have issued. This aims to ensure that every stablecoin in circulation is fully backed by assets, providing greater confidence in its stability. Annual Audit Requirements: For larger stablecoin issuers, specifically those with a market capitalization of $50 billion or more, the bill introduces mandatory annual audits. These audits would verify that the required reserves are being maintained and that the issuer is complying with other regulatory standards. Regulation on Foreign Issuers: The GENIUS Act also addresses stablecoins issued by foreign entities but used within the United States. It proposes regulations to cover these issuers, aiming to create a level playing field and prevent regulatory arbitrage. Why the GENIUS Act Matters for Crypto Regulation US This stablecoin bill is widely seen as a significant piece of potential US stablecoin regulation. Its passage could establish a foundational framework for how these digital assets are treated legally and financially in the country. For years, the crypto industry has sought regulatory clarity in the U.S., and a dedicated stablecoin law could provide a benchmark. Potential Impacts: Increased Trust and Adoption: Clear rules and strong reserve requirements could make stablecoins more appealing to traditional financial institutions and mainstream users, potentially boosting adoption. Innovation within Bounds: While regulation adds constraints, a clear framework can also provide certainty for businesses to innovate within defined boundaries. Market Structure: The requirements could favor larger, more established players who can more easily meet the licensing, reserve, and audit demands. Global Influence: Given the size of the U.S. market, this legislation could influence regulatory approaches in other countries. However, challenges remain. Some in the crypto community worry that stringent requirements could stifle innovation or create barriers to entry for smaller projects. The specifics of implementation and enforcement will also be key. What‚Äôs Next for This Stablecoin Legislation? All eyes will now be on the Senate floor next Monday for the final vote on the GENIUS Act. The successful cloture vote suggests a strong possibility of passage, but nothing is certain until the final tally is cast. If passed by the Senate, the bill would still need to navigate the House of Representatives and ultimately be signed into law by the President. However, reaching this final Senate vote is a major step forward for US stablecoin regulation. Conclusion: A Pivotal Moment for Stablecoins The impending final Senate vote on the GENIUS Act marks a pivotal moment for stablecoins and the broader crypto ecosystem in the United States. This comprehensive stablecoin bill, with its focus on licensing, reserves, and audits, represents a significant move towards establishing clear and robust stablecoin legislation. Whether it passes in its current form or not, its progress highlights the increasing urgency policymakers feel in addressing the regulatory status of stablecoins. The outcome of next week‚Äôs vote will undoubtedly shape the future trajectory of these crucial digital assets in the U.S. To learn more about the latest crypto regulation trends, explore our article on key developments shaping crypto regulation in the U.S. This post Crucial US Stablecoin Regulation Bill, GENIUS Act, Faces Final Senate Vote Next Week first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Why Crypto Market Is Down Today? DJT, S&P 500 & NASDAQ Slide Trigger Panic in Crypto
body: The post Why Crypto Market Is Down Today? DJT, S&P 500 & NASDAQ Slide Trigger Panic in Crypto appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News The global cryptocurrency market witnessed a broad downturn today, with total market capitalization falling by 1.68% to $3.39 trillion. Daily trading volume also dipped 5.27% to $133.81 billion, signaling cautious investor sentiment. The Fear & Greed Index currently sits at 61, still in the ‚ÄúGreed‚Äù zone, though edging downward as uncertainty clouds the outlook. The decline follows a sequence of macroeconomic and political events that have rattled both crypto and traditional markets. Talking about Wall Street, the S&P 500 is down 0.27% at 6,022.24, DJT fell 1.87% to 20.52, NASDAQ dropped 0.50% to 19,615.88, and the Dow Jones slipped marginally by 0.0026% to 42,865.77. Liquidations Surge as Traders Get Caught Off Guard? As price action turned against the bulls, liquidations began to mount. In the past 24 hours, 112,143 traders were liquidated, amounting to a total of $327.94 million wiped out across exchanges. The single-largest liquidation occurred on Binance‚Äôs BTCUSD perpetual pair, totaling $2.15 million. Source: CoinGlass The scale of the liquidations suggests that many traders were caught off guard by the rapid reversal in sentiment, especially those betting on a bullish continuation after the CPI dip. With leveraged positions wiped out across both long and short sides, volatility is expected to be present in the short term. BTC & ETH in Red, Altcoins Hit Harder? Bitcoin price is down 1.68% in the last 24 hours, now trading at $107,740.76. Its market cap stands at $2.14 trillion, with $53.99 billion in daily trading volume. Ethereum followed suit, dipping 1.11% to $2,760.10. Among the top altcoins, XRP dropped 1.87%, while Solana took a heavier bash with a 3.97% decline. How is DJT stock performing today(12,2025)? DJT fell 1.87% and is trading at 20.52 amid broader market declines.

title: Ukraine Lawmakers Propose Bill to Potentially Include Bitcoin in National Financial Reserves
body: Ukraine is poised to become a pioneer in integrating cryptocurrency into national financial reserves with a groundbreaking bill proposing the inclusion of virtual assets like Bitcoin in its official reserves.

title: Whale buys 400M WLFI tokens with rumors of a DEX listing
body: WLFI tokens are on the move, with a large institution moving up to $40M into the token. WLFI is still inactive and has no trading mechanism, but may be used for profit-sharing or voting. The native token of World Liberty Fi, just saw a whale or an institution move in with a $40M purchase. The OTC deal was in exchange for a direct transfer of WLFI tokens. On-chain data shows this is the second purchase for the whale address. In total, 800M tokens changed hands, suggesting an institutional-size deal. The purchase set up a price of $0.1 per WLFI, setting up hopes of a growing valuation once the token becomes tradable. The first presale buyers acquired WLFI at $0.015 and later at $0.05. A whale/institution appears to be doing an OTC deal for $WLFI . 40 mins ago, the whale sent $40M $USDT to World Liberty Finance ( @worldlibertyfi ). 8 days ago, the whale sent $40M $USDT to World Liberty and received 400M $WLFI , 4 days ago. https://t.co/eZ3ivzbYuV pic.twitter.com/0gIoXFki0v ‚Äî Onchain Lens (@OnchainLens) June 12, 2025 The renewed activity raised the question of WLFI utility in the future. Some see the purchases as preparation for trading with listing on exchanges. The WLFI community also suggests the whale purchase may be a rush to acquire more tokens ahead of the closing of OTC deals and switching to a market valuation for WLFI. World Liberty Fi will launch voting for token holders from June 16, making WLFI more important. One of the first votes is expected to push for the listing of the native token, after over a year of inactivity. The token is currently owned by over 83,000 users on Ethereum , including large-scale whales. More WLFI is available in the original team wallets, which may extend ownership following the two open pre sales. The whale‚Äôs wallet was first active in March, and has mostly performed DEX swaps, also interacting with OKX. The current WLFI purchase is the biggest single-asset transaction for the buyer. WLFI increases general crypto activity The Trump family fund is increasing its multi-chain activity. For now, WLFI is not awaiting immediate listings, and there are only speculations about the next step, possibly a DEX listing. World Liberty Fi is currently the most active around its USD1 token, aiming to expand its availability. The project‚Äôs stablecoin was recently minted on TRON, adding to its distribution. The takeover continues ü¶Ö‚òùÔ∏è The first USD1 minted on Tron‚Äîjust the beginning of something much bigger. Appreciate the support @justinsuntron . Let‚Äôs bring USD1 everywhere. https://t.co/flQVafe9Ey ‚Äî WLFI (@worldlibertyfi) June 11, 2025 Despite this, over 98% of the asset are on BNB Smart Chain, where the biggest share of trading activity happens. Meme token markets and a recent trading competition increased the activity for USD1, turning it into the fourth most traded stablecoin by daily volumes. USD1 achieved a supply of 2.18M, with a daily volume of around $453M. The token is currently most active as a counterparty to memes on PancakeSwap, further boosting the Binance ecosystem. Most of the activity reflects the current competition, where traders are battling for a ranking on the leaderboards . World Liberty Fi also funded an Aave V3 account, possibly launching its own lending platform. The fund will not use regular Aave vaults, but have its own instance of Aave V3 to control lending and liquidity. One possible goal for World Liberty Fi is to become a DeFi platform in its own right, using USD1 liquidity and WLFI tokens for voting. title: Donald Trump Had Issued an Order: New Developments Regarding the US Cryptocurrency Law
body: The US Senate approved the GENIUS Act (Guiding and Establishing National Innovation for US Stablecoins Act), a bill containing stablecoin regulations, by a vote of 68 to 30, an important step that will bring it to the final vote. In the vote held today, the Senate initiated the ‚Äúcloture‚Äù procedure necessary for the bill to be discussed in later stages. Republican Senator Tim Scott, chairman of the Senate Banking Committee and a co-sponsor of the bill, called the development a major win for both innovation and national security. ‚ÄúThis development did not happen by chance. We showed leadership. We are giving the strongest response to those who say Washington can‚Äôt act, to those who think the two parties can‚Äôt work together,‚Äù Scott said. The bill requires stablecoin issuers to have their issued assets fully backed by U.S. dollars or similar liquid assets, imposes annual audit requirements for issuers with a market value of over $50 billion, and includes regulatory provisions for issuers based abroad. Related News: List of the 20 Altcoins That Crypto Developers Have Focused On the Most in the Last Year Has Been Revealed - There's a Big Surprise at the Top President Donald Trump‚Äôs advisors also announced their support for the bill in an official statement on Monday. Trump had stated that he wanted the stablecoin bill to be submitted for his signature before August. The White House statement said, ‚ÄúIf S. 1582 is submitted to the President in its current form, his senior advisors will recommend that he sign the bill.‚Äù The Senate cloture vote paves the way for a final vote on Monday, but it could happen earlier if a timeline agreement is reached between Democratic and Republican leadership. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Donald Trump Had Issued an Order: New Developments Regarding the US Cryptocurrency Law

title: Solana ETF: Accelerating Potential for SEC Approval
body: BitcoinWorld Solana ETF: Accelerating Potential for SEC Approval Exciting news is circulating in the crypto world regarding the potential for a Solana ETF in the United States. A recent report from Bloomberg suggests that the likelihood of a spot Solana (SOL) exchange-traded fund product receiving approval is growing stronger. This development is significant for investors and the broader cryptocurrency market, indicating a potential expansion of regulated investment avenues beyond Bitcoin and Ethereum. What‚Äôs Happening with the SEC Solana ETF Approval Process? The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) plays a crucial role in approving or denying financial products like ETFs. According to Bloomberg, the SEC has taken a notable step by engaging directly with asset management firms that have filed for a Solana ETF. At least three companies have reportedly received requests from the SEC to amend their S-1 filings. These filings are the initial registration documents required for securities offerings. The SEC‚Äôs requests focus on specific details within these applications, particularly concerning: Redemption Mechanisms: How investors will be able to redeem their ETF shares (e.g., for cash or potentially in-kind SOL). Solana Staking Rewards: Whether and how any rewards generated from staking the underlying SOL held by the fund will be handled and paid out to investors. Historically, the SEC‚Äôs engagement with applicants, asking for detailed amendments rather than issuing outright rejections, has been interpreted as a positive sign. It suggests the regulator is actively reviewing the applications and working through potential structural and operational considerations necessary for approval. Why Are These SEC Requests Seen as a Positive Signal for a Solana ETF ? Market analysts and commentators view the SEC‚Äôs requests for S-1 amendments as a significant step forward. It indicates that the SEC is moving beyond initial review and is delving into the practicalities of how a Solana ETF would operate under U.S. regulations. This level of engagement is a stark contrast to periods where the regulator seemed hesitant or unwilling to discuss the specifics of crypto-related investment products. Noelle Acheson, a respected voice in the crypto space and author of the Crypto is Macro Now newsletter, has asserted that the fact the SEC is requesting amendments suggests a potential approval timeline that could be relatively short ‚Äì perhaps within a few days or at most a few weeks. This sentiment echoes the optimism seen during the final stages of the Bitcoin spot ETF approval process. The focus on redemption mechanisms is standard for any ETF, but the inquiry into staking rewards is particularly noteworthy for a Proof-of-Stake asset like Solana. It shows the SEC is grappling with the unique features of these cryptocurrencies and how they fit within the traditional financial framework of an ETF. Addressing the Nuances of Solana Staking in an ETF Structure Solana operates on a Proof-of-Stake (PoS) consensus mechanism, which allows SOL holders to ‚Äòstake‚Äô their tokens to support network operations and earn rewards. For a Solana ETF holding actual SOL tokens, the question of how to handle these potential staking rewards is critical. There are several potential approaches fund issuers might propose or the SEC might require: Reinvestment: Staking rewards could be automatically reinvested back into the fund, increasing the net asset value (NAV) over time. Cash Distribution: Rewards could be periodically distributed to ETF shareholders as cash income. Fund Manager Decision: The fund‚Äôs structure might allow the manager discretion on how to handle rewards, within regulatory guidelines. The SEC‚Äôs focus on this aspect highlights the complexity of translating native crypto economics into a traditional ETF wrapper. Clarifying how staking rewards will be managed is essential for investor understanding and regulatory compliance. The Broader Picture: Crypto ETF Landscape and Institutional Interest The potential approval of a Solana ETF follows the landmark approvals of spot Bitcoin ETFs earlier this year and the recent approvals of Ethereum spot ETFs (though trading has not yet begun for Ethereum). This progression suggests a growing regulatory comfort level with certain cryptocurrencies as underlying assets for regulated investment products. A Solana ETF would provide investors with another regulated and accessible way to gain exposure to the SOL token without directly buying, storing, or securing the cryptocurrency themselves. This accessibility is particularly appealing to traditional financial advisors and institutional investors who operate within strict compliance frameworks. The entry of multiple asset management giants preparing applications underscores the significant market demand they perceive for a SOL investment product. Companies like Grayscale, Bitwise, and VanEck, who were also pioneers in the Bitcoin and Ethereum ETF races, are among those positioning themselves for a potential SOL ETF launch. Who‚Äôs Preparing for a SOL ETF Launch and What‚Äôs the Timeline? Reports indicate that at least seven asset management companies are actively working on preparing or have already filed applications for a spot SOL ETF . This includes major players in the crypto asset management space such as: Grayscale Bitwise VanEck And others‚Ä¶ The competition among these firms highlights the anticipated demand and the race to be among the first to market if approval is granted. Regarding a timeline, while Noelle Acheson suggested days or weeks based on the S-1 amendments, previous reporting by Bitcoin World indicated that the SEC could potentially approve such a product within three to five weeks. These timelines are estimates and depend heavily on the SEC‚Äôs review process and any further questions or requirements they may have for the applicants. Benefits of a Potential Solana ETF Increased Accessibility: Allows traditional investors to gain exposure via brokerage accounts. Regulatory Clarity: Offers a regulated investment vehicle for SOL. Enhanced Liquidity: May bring more capital into the Solana ecosystem. Institutional Adoption: Facilitates investment from large funds and institutions. Potential Staking Yield: Depending on the structure, investors might benefit from staking rewards. Challenges and Considerations Regulatory Hurdles Remain: While positive, approval is not guaranteed and depends on addressing SEC concerns. Staking Complexity: Handling staking rewards within an ETF framework is novel and requires clear rules. Market Volatility: The price of SOL, like other cryptocurrencies, is highly volatile. Custody and Security: Ensuring secure custody of the underlying SOL tokens is paramount. Actionable Insights for Readers If you are interested in the potential of a Solana ETF, here are a few things to consider: Stay Informed: Continue monitoring news from the SEC, asset managers, and financial news outlets like Bloomberg. Understand the Risks: An ETF tracks the price of the underlying asset, which in this case is a volatile cryptocurrency. Research Specific ETFs: If approved, compare the structures, fees, and how staking rewards (if any) are handled by different issuers. Consult a Financial Advisor: Determine if a Solana ETF fits your investment goals and risk tolerance. Conclusion: Optimism Builds for a Solana Investment Future The news that the SEC is actively engaging with Solana ETF applicants and requesting detailed amendments to S-1 filings is a genuinely positive development. While not a guarantee of approval, it signals that the regulatory path is being explored and potentially cleared. The focus on crucial aspects like redemptions and staking rewards shows the SEC is doing its due diligence. With multiple asset managers vying to launch a product and analysts suggesting a potentially rapid timeline once these details are ironed out, optimism for a U.S. Solana ETF is undeniably accelerating. This could mark another significant step in the integration of cryptocurrencies into mainstream finance, offering investors regulated access to the dynamic Solana ecosystem. To learn more about the latest altcoin trends, explore our articles on key developments shaping Solana price action and institutional adoption. This post Solana ETF: Accelerating Potential for SEC Approval first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: It‚Äôs Not Just About ETFs: A Look at the Three Pillars of the Current XRP Bull Case
body: The bull case for XRP is now driven by three key factors: ETF filings, corporate adoption, and utility. A key SEC decision on the Franklin Templeton spot XRP ETF is expected on June 17. Within the corporate sector, NASDAQ-listed Weebis has announced a $300M XRP treasury. XRP now has all the markings of an imminent breakout from a combination of three key drivers: rising institutional interest in a spot ETF, growing adoption as a corporate treasury asset, and expanding real-world utility in global payments. This multi-faceted XRP bullish thesis is gaining traction among analysts, even as the token trades in a stable range. At press time, XRP is priced around $2.25 , give-or-take, with a market cap of $132.5 billion, but a look beneath the surface reveals several major catalysts on the horizon. title: New Document: XRP and XLM Are the Most Important Pre-Mined Coins
body: Crypto researcher SMQKE has reiterated his strong position on the strategic role of Ripple (XRP) and Stellar (XLM). In a tweet, he asserted that the two assets are ‚Äúthe most important pre-mined coins.‚Äù This statement is further backed by a document he attached to his tweet. Recognition in ISO Standards for Financial Messaging SMQKE previously explored this subject in an article published by Times Tabloid , where he described how both Ripple and Stellar are already structurally integrated into the architecture of future finance. The researcher emphasizes that XRP and XLM are not only active digital assets but also serve as frameworks around which interoperability and compliance standards for distributed ledger technologies (DLTs) are being constructed. XRP AND XLM ARE THE MOST IMPORTANT PRE-MINED COINS Documented. pic.twitter.com/YamscI9n4U ‚Äî SMQKE (@SMQKEDQG) June 10, 2025 These standards are essential to enabling blockchain systems to communicate with traditional financial institutions in a secure and consistent manner. Central to SMQKE‚Äôs claim is the recognition of Ripple and Stellar in documentation produced by the International Organization for Standardization (ISO). According to the tweet and the accompanying documentation, both platforms are cited within ISO materials that govern cross-border financial messaging, such as ISO 20022. This international standard is being adopted by banks and financial networks to unify data exchange formats, and SMQKE points out that Ripple and Stellar are mentioned as reference models for compliant DLT integration. IEEE 4210 Cites Ripple and Stellar Consensus Mechanisms In addition to ISO references, SMQKE points to the IEEE blockchain reference framework, specifically IEEE 4210, where both Ripple and Stellar are again formally acknowledged. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 The IEEE 4210 standard is a technical framework developed by the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers to assist developers, policymakers, and enterprises in building regulatory-aligned blockchain systems. Within this framework, Ripple Consensus and Stellar Consensus are named alongside other consensus mechanisms, including proof-of-work and proof-of-stake. According to SMQKE, ‚ÄúXRP AND XLM ARE THE MOST IMPORTANT PRE-MINED COINS.‚Äù This assertion highlights their integration at the standards level, well beyond the scope of speculative trading or decentralized application development. Their alignment with ISO and IEEE frameworks places them in a unique category of blockchain technologies that are not only functional but also pre-approved for interoperability with the global financial system.
