title: Three memecoins to watch this week: Fartcoin, SPX6900, aura
body: With market sentiment improving, memecoins are taking center stage in this week‚Äôs crypto rally, driven by cooling US‚ÄìChina trade tensions and softer US inflation data that has revived hopes of earlier Fed rate cuts. Following these developments, the global crypto market cap climbed to $3.59 trillion on June 11, with daily trading volume hitting $135.14 billion. Bitcoin ( BTC ) briefly pushed past $110,000, Ethereum ( ETH ) reclaimed $2,800, and XRP ( XRP ) held steady around $2.30. Although the top three tokens saw modest pullbacks today, Bitcoin‚Äôs momentum has rippled across the broader market, driving renewed interest in altcoins, with memecoins leading the charge over the past week. Here are some of the best-performing memecoins this week worth keeping an eye on. Fartcoin Fartcoin ( FARTCOIN ), a Solana-based memecoin born out of Elon Musk‚Äôs love for farts, has surged 47.8% over the last 7 days, bringing its market cap to over $1.3 billion. It‚Äôs expected to stay in the spotlight this week with a Coinbase listing set for June 12 at 9 AM PT. Ahead of the spot listing, Coinbase will also launch Fartcoin perpetual futures on its Advanced and International platforms. On the daily chart, Fartcoin has broken out of a falling wedge pattern, a formation often associated with bullish reversals. It is currently trading above its 50-day moving average, while the MACD has flashed a bullish crossover, which is often a precursor for an extended rally. FARTCOIN 50-day SMA and MACD chart ‚Äî June 12 | Source: crypto.news If this trend holds, the next target could be a retest of the $1.64 level. You might also like: Ethereum holds $2.7K as ETF inflows surge and ETH options flip sharply bullish SPX6900 SPX6900 ( SPX ), a memecoin with a tongue-in-cheek mission to flip traditional markets, has rallied for five consecutive days, hitting an all-time high of $1.73 on June 11. Its market capitalization has climbed from $275 million in March to nearly $1.6 billion at press time. The token is drawing attention this week for two key reasons. First, it has continued to gain despite its official X account being suspended, a development that would typically hurt sentiment. Instead, the sustained rally has highlighted the strength and engagement of its community, which could attract further interest. Second, whale activity has picked up. Large holders now control over 106 million SPX tokens, up from 105 million in mid-May. At the same time, the amount of SPX on exchanges has dropped noticeably, which is usually a sign that investors are holding, not selling, fueling even more hype and FOMO. From a technical perspective, the SPX6900 is forming a cup-and-handle pattern on the daily chart, a setup that often signals further upside. SPX price, CMF and Aroon chart ‚Äî June 12 | Source: crypto.news The price looks poised to touch the upper boundary around $1.742. Once it hits the target, if it pulls back slightly to form the ‚Äúhandle‚Äù and holds support, it could set the stage for the next leg up. Furthermore, the Chaikin Money Flow is positive, indicating buying pressure, while the Aroon Up is at 92.86%, suggesting that a strong uptrend remains in effect. Hence, if bulls stay in control, the SPX could continue to push higher after a brief consolidation. aura aura (AURA) has surged by more than 9,700% in the past week, climbing from around $0.00090 to $0.090, with its market cap jumping from just $1 million to nearly $83 million. The memecoin had seen little to no activity for months, but suddenly spiked on June 10 following a wave of buying pressure. On-chain data suggests that a single whale accumulation , rumoured to be linked to the SPX community, played a key role in triggering the rally. More than $500,000 worth of AURA was reportedly deployed across decentralised exchanges within a few hours, causing a price cascade as retail traders rushed in. Over 215 wallets interacted with the token during the peak surge, driving daily volume up by over 100,000%. On the daily chart, the MACD lines and Relative Strength Index have moved well above overbought levels, indicating a potential pullback could be on the horizon. AURA price, RSI and MACD chart ‚Äî June 12 | Source: crypto.news Despite this, if momentum continues and visibility grows across trading forums and social media, AURA could see further upside in the near term, especially given its low float and speculative appeal. However, the lack of fundamentals, project updates, or clear utility means the rally is driven largely by sentiment and volatility. As with most parabolic runs, profit-taking by early holders could trigger equally steep pullbacks, making AURA a high-risk, high-reward trade at current levels. Read more: SEC blocks DeFi Development‚Äôs $1B Solana plan, company withdraws S-3 filing Disclosure: This article does not represent investment advice. The content and materials featured on this page are for educational purposes only.

title: Bitcoin Treasury: F Street Commits $10M in Bold Corporate Strategy
body: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Treasury: F Street Commits $10M in Bold Corporate Strategy In a move that underscores the growing mainstream acceptance of digital assets, investment firm F Street has announced significant plans for its Bitcoin treasury . This decision highlights a notable shift in how companies are viewing and utilizing cryptocurrencies as part of their core financial planning. Why Are Companies Pursuing a Corporate Bitcoin Strategy ? F Street‚Äôs announcement to purchase $10 million worth of Bitcoin for its treasury reserves isn‚Äôt happening in a vacuum. It‚Äôs part of a larger, evolving trend where businesses are exploring alternatives to traditional cash reserves and low-yield assets. But what drives this interest? Inflation Hedge: Many companies see Bitcoin as a potential hedge against inflation, especially in the current macroeconomic climate where fiat currencies may be losing purchasing power. Store of Value: Bitcoin‚Äôs limited supply (capped at 21 million coins) and decentralized nature are often cited as reasons it could serve as a reliable store of value over the long term. Potential Appreciation: While volatile, Bitcoin has shown significant growth potential, offering the possibility of increasing the value of treasury assets. Diversification: Adding Bitcoin can diversify a company‚Äôs balance sheet beyond traditional assets. Future-Proofing: Aligning with digital asset trends can position a company as forward-thinking and innovative. This strategic shift by firms like F Street signals increasing confidence in Bitcoin as a legitimate asset class, moving it beyond speculative trading into serious financial planning. Exploring F Street‚Äôs Specific Bitcoin Investment Plan According to reports, including one from Bitcoin Magazine on X, F Street intends to acquire $10 million in Bitcoin. What‚Äôs particularly interesting about their approach is the methodology: Instead of a single large purchase, F Street plans to make daily buys. This dollar-cost averaging (DCA) strategy aims to mitigate the impact of Bitcoin‚Äôs price volatility. By spreading purchases over time, they can potentially achieve a lower average cost per Bitcoin compared to a lump-sum purchase that might coincide with a price peak. The funds for these purchases will come directly from the firm‚Äôs business proceeds, indicating a deliberate allocation of operational capital towards building their digital asset reserves. This isn‚Äôt just passive investment; it‚Äôs an active decision to integrate Bitcoin into their financial framework. Is This Part of a Broader Institutional Bitcoin Trend? Absolutely. F Street is joining a growing list of publicly traded and private companies that have added Bitcoin to their balance sheets. Pioneers like MicroStrategy have been particularly vocal and aggressive in their Bitcoin investment strategy, accumulating substantial amounts over time. Other notable examples include Tesla, Block (formerly Square), and various investment funds. The increasing participation of investment firms like F Street in the institutional Bitcoin space is significant. It suggests that professional money managers and financial strategists are becoming more comfortable with the asset, developing frameworks for its custody, accounting, and risk management. This trend lends further credibility to Bitcoin and can pave the way for even larger players to consider similar moves in the future. Each new corporate adoption, regardless of size, adds another data point to the viability of Bitcoin as a treasury asset. What Does the F Street Bitcoin Decision Mean for the Market? While a $10 million purchase might seem modest compared to the multi-billion dollar acquisitions by some giants, F Street‚Äôs move is still impactful: Validation: It provides further validation for Bitcoin as a legitimate asset class suitable for corporate treasuries. Demand: Consistent daily buying, even in smaller amounts, contributes to sustained demand in the market. Sentiment: Positive news of corporate adoption can boost overall market sentiment and encourage other firms to explore the option. Precedent: For other investment firms or businesses of similar size, F Street‚Äôs strategy could serve as a template or inspiration. The decision by F Street to allocate a portion of its reserves to Bitcoin reflects a calculated approach to navigating the current economic landscape and positioning the firm for potential future growth in the digital asset space. Their use of daily buys is a practical example of managing the volatility inherent in cryptocurrency markets when building a long-term position. Considering a Bitcoin Treasury for Your Business? Key Insights F Street‚Äôs strategy offers valuable insights for any business contemplating a similar move: Start Small: You don‚Äôt need to allocate a massive percentage of your reserves initially. A smaller allocation allows you to get comfortable with the process and volatility. Have a Clear Strategy: Define your objectives (e.g., inflation hedge, long-term growth) and your purchasing methodology (e.g., lump sum, DCA). Address Custody and Security: Securely storing Bitcoin is paramount. Explore reputable custodians or robust self-custody solutions. Understand the Accounting and Tax Implications: Bitcoin holdings have specific accounting treatments and tax obligations that need to be addressed. Be Prepared for Volatility: Bitcoin‚Äôs price can fluctuate significantly. Ensure your business can tolerate potential short-term drawdowns. The F Street Bitcoin purchase is more than just a headline; it‚Äôs a case study in how businesses are actively adapting to the evolving financial landscape and incorporating digital assets into their long-term financial health. Conclusion F Street‚Äôs plan to acquire $10 million in Bitcoin for its treasury reserves through daily buys is a clear signal of increasing confidence in cryptocurrency among institutional players. This move aligns with a broader trend of companies exploring corporate Bitcoin strategy as a means to diversify reserves, hedge against inflation, and potentially capture long-term growth. As more firms make the leap into institutional Bitcoin , it further solidifies Bitcoin‚Äôs position as a significant asset in the global financial system. The decision by F Street Bitcoin is another step in the ongoing integration of digital assets into traditional finance, demonstrating a practical approach to building a Bitcoin treasury in the modern era. To learn more about the latest explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin institutional adoption. This post Bitcoin Treasury: F Street Commits $10M in Bold Corporate Strategy first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Over a third of Bitcoin‚Äôs circulating supply is in instituitional hands: report
body: Over a third of Bitcoin‚Äôs circulating supply is now held by centralized treasuries, including centralized exchanges, exchange-traded funds, and governments. According to the recent Gemini and Glassnode‚Äôs Report , over 30% of Bitcoin ( BTC ) circulating supply is now held by just 216 centralized entities across six categories: centralized exchanges, ETFs and funds, public companies, private companies, DeFi protocols, and governments. This consolidation of Bitcoin into institutional hands coincides with its rapid price appreciation‚Äîfrom under $1,000 in 2015 to over $100,000 today, suggesting that major institutions now view Bitcoin as a strategic, long-term asset. Across nearly all categories, with the exception of private companies, the top three entities hold between 65% to 90% of the total assets, reflecting the outsized role of early movers, especially in the DeFi, public company, and ETF categories, in shaping the early trajectory of institutional Bitcoin adoption. Source: Bitcoin Adoption, Volatility, and Market Cap | Gemini and Glassnode‚Äôs Report You might also like: Why ‚Äúthere‚Äôs not going to be enough Bitcoin‚Äù according to Bitwise CEO The report also notes that over the past two years, Bitcoin balances on CEXs have declined, which has frequently been mistaken for an imminent supply shortage. However, the majority of that BTC has shifted to ETFs and funds, especially U.S. spot ETFs. Since June 2021, the total BTC held by this spot trading sector has remained relatively stable, fluctuating between 3.9 million and 4.2 million BTC. This stability indicates that the decrease in exchange balances reflects a structural redistribution of custody rather than a reduction in overall supply. The increasing share held by ETFs signals greater adoption by TradFi , yet the total liquidity available to spot buyers has stayed largely consistent. You might also like: Bitcoin supply on exchanges drops to 8-year low. Will BTC set a new all-time high? The report also highlighted that the creation of the U.S. Strategic Bitcoin Reserve has significantly boosted institutional confidence in Bitcoin as a sovereign-grade asset. Following the SBR announcement, public and private companies have significantly increased their Bitcoin purchases. The report concludes that with over 30% of Bitcoin‚Äôs circulating supply held by centralized entities, the market has undergone a structural shift catalyzed by long-term investments and strategic custody. While early adopters continue to dominate holdings, Bitcoin‚Äôs acceptance as a sovereign-grade asset‚Äîmarked by the SBR‚Äîhas boosted institutional confidence. Even as custody moves from exchanges to ETFs and other custodians, the overall supply available for spot trading has remained stable. You might also like: U.S. creating a strategic Bitcoin reserve is ‚Äòvery significant,‚Äô analyst says

title: A Massive $800 Million Bitcoin (BTC) Move Came From a US Company!
body: Recently, many companies have stepped up their Bitcoin (BTC) purchases, following in the footsteps of MicroStrategy (Strategy). While one of the most important of these, the US giant GameStop, made its second Bitcoin purchase, another company started preparations to buy BTC. Mercurity Fintech (Nasdaq: MFH), a Nasdaq-listed digital fintech group, has announced plans to raise $800 million to create a long-term Bitcoin treasury reserve. Accordingly, the company stated that it will collect $800 million for the Bitcoin treasury reserve. Aside from purchasing Bitcoin, the funds raised will also be used to integrate blockchain-focused custody services, staking, and tokenized treasury management into the company‚Äôs digital reserve framework. The company also said that FTSE Russell is expected to be included in the broad market Russell 3000 and Russell 2000 Indexes under its 2025 annual restructuring preliminary list. The company‚Äôs CEO, Shi Qiu, said the following about the Bitcoin move: ‚ÄúWe are creating this Bitcoin treasury reserve based on our belief that Bitcoin will be a fundamental component of the future financial infrastructure. We are positioning our company to be a key player in the evolving digital financial ecosystem. Our company is also set to move from Russell Microcap to Russell 2000, demonstrating that investors recognize the value we create in blockchain finance. Our Bitcoin treasury reserve initiative is the next logical step in this direction.‚Äù *This is not investment advice. title: Citigroup Braces for Loan Losses, Sets Aside Hundreds of Millions of Dollars for Potential Downturn Amid Tough Macro Environment: Report
body: The financial giant Citigroup Inc. is reportedly bracing for loan losses amid macroeconomic uncertainty. To deal with the potential losses, the investment bank is planning to put aside hundreds of millions of dollars more than it did in the previous quarter, Bloomberg reports . While speaking at a Morgan Stanley conference this week, Vis Raghavan, Citigroup‚Äôs head of banking, reportedly cautioned that the firm‚Äôs credit reserve build can change its outlook rapidly. ‚ÄúGiven the macro environment, etc., cost of credit compared to last quarter, we expect to be up a few hundred million.‚Äù Bloomberg also reports, however, that analysts expect loan losses to go down in the second quarter. Raghavan said 80% of Citigroup‚Äôs corporate exposure is to entities with high creditworthiness. ‚ÄúWe still have a few more weeks to go in this quarter, but on the credit overall, I‚Äôm incredibly reassured of the quality.‚Äù The executive reportedly notes, however, that the firm‚Äôs investment banking business has been hurt by the ongoing macroeconomic uncertainty. ‚ÄúWhat investment banking likes is clarity. So either it‚Äôs really bad or really good, whatever it is, just give us the news, but it is that middle area of not knowing that really freezes market activity.‚Äù Follow us on X , Facebook and Telegram Don't Miss a Beat ‚Äì Subscribe to get email alerts delivered directly to your inbox Check Price Action Surf The Daily Hodl Mix Disclaimer: Opinions expressed at The Daily Hodl are not investment advice. title: BREAKING: Hong Kong‚Äôs Legendary Education Group Announces Bold $3.82M Crypto Investment Plan
body: BitcoinWorld BREAKING: Hong Kong‚Äôs Legendary Education Group Announces Bold $3.82M Crypto Investment Plan In a significant move signaling growing confidence in the digital asset space, Hong Kong‚Äôs Legendary Education Group, a company listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange, has announced its intention to make a substantial Hong Kong crypto investment . What is Legendary Education Group Planning? Legendary Education Group, known primarily as an investment holding company, revealed its plans to allocate up to HK$30 million, which translates to approximately $3.82 million USD, towards investments in the cryptocurrency market. This strategic decision was formalized with the establishment of a dedicated investment committee, tasked with overseeing the group‚Äôs foray into virtual assets. Why is Legendary Education Group Making This Move Now? The board of Legendary Education Group expressed clear optimism regarding the current state and future potential of the cryptocurrency market. They cited the ‚Äúrobust momentum‚Äù observed in the space as a key driver behind their decision to diversify into digital assets. This indicates a belief that cryptocurrencies offer compelling growth opportunities that align with the group‚Äôs investment objectives. Key aspects of their investment strategy include: Funding Source: The investment will be funded entirely from the group‚Äôs existing internal financial resources. This suggests confidence in their current liquidity and a long-term perspective on this new asset class. Execution Method: Investments will be conducted through the open market. Platform Choice: Crucially, the group emphasized that the investments will be made exclusively on a regulated platform , specifically a licensed virtual asset trading platform. This highlights a commitment to compliance and security in their approach to digital asset investment. The Significance of Investing on a Regulated Platform Choosing a regulated platform is a critical point in Legendary Education Group‚Äôs announcement. As the cryptocurrency landscape evolves, regulatory clarity and compliance are becoming increasingly important, especially for publicly listed companies. Investing through a licensed platform in Hong Kong provides several potential benefits: Investor Protection: Licensed platforms typically adhere to strict operational and security standards, offering a higher degree of protection for assets. Legal Compliance: It ensures the investment activities are in line with Hong Kong‚Äôs evolving regulations for virtual assets . Market Integrity: Trading on regulated platforms can contribute to greater market transparency and reduce risks associated with unregulated exchanges. This approach sets a precedent for other traditional firms in Hong Kong considering similar moves, emphasizing a cautious yet forward-thinking strategy towards integrating digital assets into their portfolios. What Does This Mean for Corporate Crypto Adoption? Legendary Education Group‚Äôs planned investment is another data point in the growing trend of corporate crypto adoption globally and, importantly, within Hong Kong. While $3.82 million might seem modest compared to investments by larger global corporations, it represents a significant step for a Hong Kong-listed investment holding company venturing into this space. It signals that digital assets are increasingly being viewed as legitimate investment opportunities by traditional financial and investment firms in the region. This move could potentially: Encourage other Hong Kong-based companies to explore digital asset investments. Increase liquidity and trading volume on regulated virtual asset platforms in Hong Kong. Further solidify Hong Kong‚Äôs position as a hub for regulated cryptocurrency activities in Asia. Looking Ahead: The Future of Virtual Assets in Hong Kong The decision by Legendary Education Group to invest in virtual assets underscores the shifting perception of cryptocurrencies from speculative curiosities to legitimate components of an investment portfolio. As regulatory frameworks in Hong Kong continue to mature, it is likely that more traditional companies will evaluate similar opportunities. The focus on using a regulated platform is particularly telling, indicating a desire for secure, compliant entry into the market. This development is a positive sign for the broader cryptocurrency ecosystem, demonstrating increasing institutional interest and confidence in the long-term viability and growth potential of digital assets, starting with a notable Hong Kong crypto investment . To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping virtual assets institutional adoption. title: Ripple sets bold five-year target to capture SWIFT transaction volume with XRP
body: Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse has predicted that XRP could take up to 14% of interbank messaging platform SWIFT transaction volume in the next five years. Garlinghouse shared this projection at the recent XRPL Apex Conference in Singapore. The CEO said this in response to an interviewer‚Äôs question at the event. According to him, SWIFT today is premised on messaging and liquidity. With the liquidity being owned by banks, he believes XRP can supplant that with crypto liquidity. He said: ‚ÄúThere are two parts to SWIFT today: messaging and liquidity. The banks own liquidity. I think less about the messaging and more about liquidity. If you‚Äôre driving all the liquidity, it is good for XRP‚Ä¶ so I‚Äôll say five years, 14%.‚Äù Garlinghouse‚Äôs comments highlight how Ripple is counting on using crypto liquidity to gain market share in the cross-border payments sector. With its approach, the firm expects that its ability to offer faster and cheaper transactions that leverage blockchain technology will be enough to take market share from SWIFT. Currently, SWIFT powers the majority of all international transactions. Interestingly, there have been reports of a potential partnership between Ripple and SWIFT that could integrate XRP with the platform. However, Ripple‚Äôs moves suggest it is more likely to position itself as a competitor. XRPL EVM sidechain to launch soon Meanwhile, talks at the XRPL APEX were not restricted to Ripple‚Äôs ambitions for cross-border payments, with the company‚Äôs CTO David Schwartz also announcing a couple of developments within the XRPL ecosystem. The biggest update was that the XRPL Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) sidechain will launch in Q2 of 2025. The product Ripple developed in partnership with Peersyst already has its testnet active since March 31, with over 80 projects already deployed on the testnet. Given that June is the last month of Q2, it is expected that Ripple could launch the sidechain sometime this month. That could be a major boost for activity on XRPL by allowing Ethereum-compatible smart contracts and decentralized applications on XRPL. According to Ripple, over 6 million active wallets are on the network, with a lifetime transaction volume of around 33 billion. However, it could use a boost in DeFi transactions, with payments currently dominating on-chain network activity. Interestingly, XRPL is already primed to see more activity with Ondo Finance , which is finally launching its OUSG tokenized US treasuries product on the network. This comes after the real-world assets tokenization protocol announced the plan in January. Users can mint and redeem OUSG on XRPL using Ripple stablecoin RLUSD. Other announcements on the first day of APEX include the news that publicly trading Vivo Power will deploy $100 million in XRP to the Flare ecosystem to generate yield and the upgrade that allows XRPL to support Dynamic NFTs. XRP is down 3% despite conference optimism Meanwhile, the developments announced at the XRPL APEX did nothing for the XRP price over the last 24 hours. According to CoinMarketCap, the token is down almost 3.5% today, falling to $2.244. This decline is likely due to the general fall in the price of crypto assets after Bitcoin slipped from over $110,000 to $107,000, causing almost all other tokens to also record a slump . XRP could not buck the trend despite the positive sentiments expected from its conference. With its recent decline, the token has been down 3.35% year-to-date. This best describes how 2025 has been for XRP, with the token steadying around above $2 and struggling to see any major gains. Nevertheless, the XRPL APEX is a three-day event set to end by June 12, so many positive updates to the ecosystem could still be announced. XRP holders will be counting on such to boost the token value. KEY Difference Wire : the secret tool crypto projects use to get guaranteed media coverage

title: Why Is Crypto Down Today? ‚Äì June 12, 2025
body: After two days of rising prices, the crypto market is down today. Nearly all top 100 coins have recorded decreases over the past 24 hours. The cryptocurrency market capitalization has dropped by 4% to $3.51 trillion. The total crypto trading volume is at $132 billion. TL;DR: The market turns red today, most top 100 coins are down; BTC dropped to the $107,500 level, ETH is at $2,749; Ethereum‚Äôs bounce-back signals more than just price action; Volatility expectations are increasing; US spot ETH ETFs outperform their BTC counterparts: $240.29 million vs $164.57 million; Markets are digesting the news of the US-China trade agreement and the US inflation report; The dip may be a short-term development, but the market is at a crossroads. Crypto Winners & Losers In complete contrast to yesterday‚Äôs situation, all top 10 coins per market cap have seen their prices decrease over the past 24 hours. Bitcoin (BTC) fell by 1.7%, dropping from the $109,500 level to the current price of $107,563. Ethereum (ETH) is close by, decreasing by 1.6% to the price of $2,749. While Dogecoin (DOGE) was the highest gainer yesterday, it saw the highest drop in this category today: 6.2% to $0.1898. Moreover, most of the top 100 coins are down today. Only four are up, with SPX6900 (SPX) recording the highest increase of 8.1% to $1.68. Jupiter (JUP) saw the highest decrease, and the only double-digit one: 10.6% to $0.4538. The markets have seen a variety of significant developments this week, including the tentative trade agreement between the US and China, US inflation report, as well as the US Senate voting to invoke cloture on a substitute amendment to the stablecoin GENIUS Act . Big headline, but the devil‚Äôs in the details. Let‚Äôs see the terms before calling it a game-changer. Markets might pump short-term, but long-term trust takes more than a tweet. ‚Äî GameCentric (@gamecentric_io) June 11, 2025 Speaking of stablecoins, Ant Group , the Jack Ma-backed fintech giant, plans to apply for stablecoin licenses in key Asian markets. It is eyeing licenses in Hong Kong and Singapore, as well as in Luxembourg. Crypto Market Sensitivity to Price Fluctuations Rises Per Glassnode‚Äôs latest report, BTC is holding above the psychologically significant $100,000 level, indicating that investor confidence remains robust. At the same time, volatility expectations are rising. The dense concentration of coin supply near the current spot prices increases market sensitivity to price fluctuations, the analysts argue. That said, mature investors have no losses locked. Almost all loss-taking occurred from top buyers across the ATH formation. This suggests ‚Äúa capitulation of only the most speculative of investors.‚Äù Yet, Options At-the-Money Implied Volatility ‚Äúacross all major tenors remain historically low, suggesting that options traders may be underpricing the likelihood of a volatility regime shift,‚Äù Glassnode says. Source: Glassnode However, many eyes are on Ethereum these days. Dom Harz, co-founder of Layer-2 BOB , commented that ETH‚Äôs price rise in recent days ‚Äúmarks a significant shift in sentiment toward an asset that had, until relatively recently, fallen out of favour.‚Äù Ethereum‚Äôs bounce-back signals more than just price action, Harz argues. ‚ÄúThe momentum reflects a meaningful shift in sentiment, fuelled by a combination of technical progress, market activity, and regulatory signals.‚Äù The Pectra upgrade has gone live and been reinforced by the US Securities and Exchange (SEC) Commissioner Paul Atkins‚Äô support for DeFi, as well as the strong performance of Circle‚Äôs record-breaking IPO, the co-founder says. ‚ÄúThese are exciting times for DeFi and for Ethereum‚Äôs role in the industry‚Äôs next chapter. Hopefully, we are moving beyond the memecoin noise and back to building scalable, decentralised systems ‚Äî the foundations for crypto‚Äôs future,‚Äù Harz concluded. Levels & Events to Watch Next At the time of writing, BTC trades at $107,563, the lowest it‚Äôs been today, significantly moving away from the all-time high of $111,814, which it hit on 22 May. Notably, it‚Äôs also back to the levels seen at the beginning of this week before it started this latest push upwards. Also notably, this is a pullback from the intraday high of $110,269, indicating the coin‚Äôs initiative to move towards and above the ATH. The key support level stands at $97,600, while the resistance is at $115,400. Bitcoin Price Chart. Source: TradingView In the same time period, Ethereum hit an intraday high of $2,870. It‚Äôs also interesting to note that this intraday high moves higher every day. Analysts argue that ETH is poised for further increases. Moreover, the crypto market sentiment slightly decreased within the greed zone. Crypto Fear and Greed Index fell from 65 yesterday to 61 today . This may indicate that the market is overheating and heading for a correction, but there are also movements towards the neutral zone, which would ease these concerns. ‚ÄúEncouragingly, the wave of fear in market sentiment did not translate into a meaningful shift in spending behavior,‚Äù Glassnode says. ‚ÄúWhen assessing losses locked in on-chain, only -$200M of losses were realized, with the magnitude significantly shallower than previous correction events. This suggests that loss-taking remained contained, with investors largely unfazed by the drawdown.‚Äù Meanwhile, US BTC spot exchange-traded funds (ETFs) saw a net inflow of $164.57 million on Wednesday. BlackRock leads the list with $131.01 million. The cumulative total net inflow now stands at $45.22 billion. At the same time, US ETH spot ETFs have recorded 18 consecutive days of inflows. Today, they surpassed the BTC counterparts, with $240.29 million in inflows. BlackRock is the biggest contributor to this amount with $163.64 million on 11 June. The cumulative total net inflow climbed to $3.74 billion. According to Seamus Rocca, Chief Executive Officer of Xapo Bank , ‚Äúthe rise of corporate treasury allocations to Bitcoin is significant, but it shouldn‚Äôt be about chasing trends or building oversized positions. It‚Äôs about allocating what a business can afford to hold over a five-to-ten-year horizon, without being forced to sell into volatility.‚Äù Companies like Strategy and Metaplanet represent ‚Äúhigh-conviction outliers, headline grabbers with bold strategies that align with their unique business aims.‚Äù However, for most others, a more measured approach is better suited ‚Äì ‚Äúone grounded in long-term belief, not short-term reliance on volatility. In this space, patience and discipline can be underrated virtues,‚Äù Rocca emphasizes. ‚ÄúOur view has been, and remains, that Bitcoin deserves serious consideration‚Äîbut with a disciplined, long-term framework: focus on the asset itself, avoid speculative trading, and size positions responsibly,‚Äù Rocca concludes. Quick FAQ Why did crypto move with stocks today? Both the crypto and stock markets have increased in the last day, though crypto‚Äôs increase is notably higher. The S&P 500 has decreased by 0.27%, the Nasdaq-100 is down 0.37%, and the Dow Jones Industrial Average fell by 0.0026%. The markets are reacting to and are still digesting the developments related to Wednesday‚Äôs US inflation report and the result of the trade talks between the US and China. Is this dip sustainable? The dip may be brief, followed by another rally, given the still prevailing bullish sentiment. However, the market stands at a crossroads, and further dips, even if short-term, are possible. The post Why Is Crypto Down Today? ‚Äì June 12, 2025 appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: XRP Price Prediction for June 13, 2025: Breakdown Extends Below $2.30 as Bears Retake Control
body: Following a failed breakout attempt above $2.35 earlier this week, the XRP price today is under renewed pressure, slipping to $2.23 at the time of writing. The downturn reflects a shift in short-term sentiment as bulls retreat from key resistance, exposing the altcoin to further downside risks ahead of mid-June. What‚Äôs Happening With XRP‚Äôs Price? XRPUSD price dynamics (Source: TradingView) The XRP price action has turned sharply lower on the 4-hour and 30-minute charts after price got firmly rejected near the $2.32‚Äì$2.35 supply zone. This level had previously acted as a neckline resistance from the May 27 swing high, and the inability to break above it prompted a wave of selling. Price is now trading below all major short-term EMAs (20/50/100/200) on the 4-hour chart, with the 20 EMA now curving downward at $2.27, highlighting weakening bullish momentum. Adding to the pressure, the Bollinger Bands are beginning to expand to the downside, and price is hugging the lower band near $2.22, which suggests volatility is returning in favor of the bears. XRPUSD price dynamics (Source: TradingView) The RSI on the 30-minute chart has dropped to 33.5, signaling ‚Ä¶ The post XRP Price Prediction for June 13, 2025: Breakdown Extends Below $2.30 as Bears Retake Control appeared first on Coin Edition .

title: Token Supply Surges Trigger Price Drops Across Emerging Crypto Projects
body: Token supply surges are outpacing demand, leading to widespread price declines. Projects like Taiko and Pyth show weak market absorption despite higher circulation. Morpho shows relative resilience, but most tokens face steep valuation pressures. A new analysis highlights a growing concern in the altcoin market; that of several crypto projects seeing dramatic increases in token supply putting severe downward pressure on prices. In most cases, markets have struggled to absorb the new supply, with price and market cap often declining in tandem. This trend underlines a concerning mismatch between token emissions and investor demand, which is placing pressure on valuations across multiple ecosystems. According to data from Tokenomist, several projects have seen their circulating supply surge over the past month, but this increase has, in most cases, failed to be absorbed by the market, leading to significant price declines. Over the past 30 days, several tokens saw significant increases in circulating supply. Key Observations: ‚Ä¢ All tokens with the highest 30D supply growth posted negative returns, confirming continued underperformance post-emissions. ‚Ä¢ Circ‚Ä¶ The post Token Supply Surges Trigger Price Drops Across Emerging Crypto Projects appeared first on Coin Edition .

title: Ethereum ETF Inflows Surge: US Spot ETH ETFs See Massive $240.7M Inflow
body: BitcoinWorld Ethereum ETF Inflows Surge: US Spot ETH ETFs See Massive $240.7M Inflow Get ready for some exciting news from the world of crypto finance! US spot Ethereum ETFs are making serious waves, demonstrating growing investor appetite for digital assets. On June 11, these investment vehicles saw a significant boost, recording a massive $240.7 million in total net inflows. This isn‚Äôt just a one-off event; it marks the 18th consecutive trading day of net inflows and stands out as the largest single-day inflow observed over the past four months. This surge in US spot Ethereum ETFs activity is a clear indicator of shifting market dynamics and increasing confidence. What Exactly Are US Spot Ethereum ETFs? Before diving deeper into the recent numbers, let‚Äôs quickly touch upon what US spot Ethereum ETFs are. An ETF, or Exchange-Traded Fund, is an investment fund that holds assets like stocks, bonds, or, in this case, cryptocurrencies. A ‚Äúspot‚Äù ETF means the fund directly holds the underlying asset ‚Äì Ethereum (ETH) ‚Äì rather than derivatives or futures contracts. Think of it this way: When you buy shares of a spot Ethereum ETF, you are essentially gaining exposure to the price movements of Ethereum without needing to buy and hold ETH yourself on a crypto exchange. The ETF provider handles the complexities of buying, storing, and securing the actual Ethereum. These ETFs trade on traditional stock exchanges, making them accessible through standard brokerage accounts. The approval and launch of ETH ETF products in the US have been highly anticipated events, following the successful rollout of Bitcoin spot ETFs earlier in the year. They offer a regulated and familiar investment pathway for individuals and institutions alike. The Surge in Ethereum ETF Inflows: Breaking Down the Numbers The $240.7 million figure for June 11 is truly noteworthy. It highlights a significant influx of capital into these nascent products. According to data shared by Trader T (@thepfund) on X, this single day represented the peak inflow over the last four months, signaling strong momentum for Ethereum ETF inflows . Let‚Äôs look at how the major players stacked up on that particular day: ETF Provider Ticker Net Inflows (June 11) BlackRock ETHA $164.05 million Fidelity FETH $37.28 million Grayscale (Mini) ETH $19.61 million Grayscale ETHE $13.30 million Bitwise ETHW $6.46 million As you can see, BlackRock‚Äôs ETHA dominated the inflows, capturing the lion‚Äôs share. Fidelity and Grayscale‚Äôs products also saw substantial capital injections. The fact that this marks the 18th consecutive day of net inflows suggests a sustained positive trend rather than just a brief blip. Why Do These Ethereum ETF Inflows Matter for the Crypto Market? The consistent and significant Ethereum ETF inflows are a bullish signal for several reasons: Institutional Adoption: ETFs are often preferred by large institutional investors, financial advisors, and traditional fund managers who might face regulatory or logistical hurdles investing directly in crypto. Inflows indicate that this class of investors is starting to allocate capital to Ethereum via these regulated products. Increased Accessibility: ETFs make investing in Ethereum as easy as buying a stock, opening up the market to a much broader base of retail investors who may be hesitant to use crypto exchanges. Market Validation: The demand for these products validates Ethereum as a significant asset class in traditional finance circles. Potential Price Impact: While not a direct one-to-one relationship, sustained inflows mean that ETF providers are buying large amounts of actual ETH on the market to back the shares being purchased by investors. This consistent buying pressure can positively influence the Ethereum price . The performance of Crypto ETF products, particularly Bitcoin and now Ethereum, is increasingly seen as a key metric for tracking the integration of digital assets into mainstream finance. Considering Investing? What Are the Benefits and Challenges of ETH ETFs? For investors looking at gaining exposure to Ethereum, the ETH ETF route offers distinct advantages and disadvantages compared to buying ETH directly: Benefits: Simplicity and Familiarity: Trade through existing brokerage accounts. Regulatory Oversight: ETFs are regulated financial products, offering a layer of investor protection not always present with direct crypto investments. Custody Handled: No need to worry about setting up wallets, managing private keys, or securing your ETH yourself. Liquidity: ETFs trade on major exchanges, typically offering high liquidity. Challenges: Fees: ETFs charge management fees (expense ratios) which can eat into returns over time. Tracking Error: The ETF‚Äôs performance might not perfectly mirror the spot price of Ethereum due to fees, trading costs, and operational factors. Indirect Ownership: You own shares of a fund that owns ETH, not the ETH itself. This means you cannot stake your ETH or use it in DeFi applications. Market Hours: ETFs only trade during traditional market hours, unlike the 24/7 crypto market. Understanding these trade-offs is crucial when deciding the best approach for your investment goals and risk tolerance regarding the Ethereum price exposure. What‚Äôs Next for US Spot Ethereum ETFs? The recent positive inflow trend suggests strong initial demand following the initial regulatory hurdles. The approval process itself was a significant catalyst, and the subsequent inflows indicate that investors were ready to jump in once the products became available. Future performance will likely depend on several factors: Overall Crypto Market Sentiment: As with any crypto-related product, performance is heavily tied to the broader market‚Äôs health and sentiment. Regulatory Environment: Continued clarity and favorable regulations could encourage more traditional finance players to engage. Product Competition: As more providers launch their ETH ETFs, competition could lead to lower fees, benefiting investors. Ethereum‚Äôs Development: Updates and developments within the Ethereum network itself could impact investor confidence and demand for ETH-related products. The success seen in Bitcoin ETFs, which have accumulated tens of billions in assets, sets a potential precedent for the growth trajectory of US spot Ethereum ETFs . Conclusion: A Strong Signal for Ethereum‚Äôs Future The news of Ethereum ETF inflows reaching $240.7 million on June 11, marking the largest single-day inflow in four months and the 18th consecutive day of positive flows, is undeniably a powerful signal. It underscores growing institutional and retail interest in Ethereum as an asset class and highlights the impact of regulated investment products like the ETH ETF on bridging the gap between traditional finance and the crypto world. While the market remains volatile, the sustained demand reflected in these inflows provides a compelling narrative for the increasing acceptance and potential future growth of Ethereum within the global financial landscape. It‚Äôs a development that investors and market watchers will continue to monitor closely. To learn more about the latest Ethereum trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Ethereum institutional adoption. This post Ethereum ETF Inflows Surge: US Spot ETH ETFs See Massive $240.7M Inflow first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Pakistan Turns to Bitcoin Mining to Solve $7.4 Billion Energy Crisis
body: The post Pakistan Turns to Bitcoin Mining to Solve $7.4 Billion Energy Crisis appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Pakistan is considering a new approach to deal with its long-standing energy crisis by introducing Bitcoin mining powered by unused electricity. The government has proposed a strategy to redirect up to 2,000 megawatts (MW) of surplus energy to crypto mining and AI data centers, turning financial losses into potential gains. This marks a major shift in how the country looks at energy and digital assets. Pakistan‚Äôs troubling financial state resembles its urgency to take Bitcoin seriously and to resolve its decade-long energy issues as well. 5Ô∏è‚É£ Energy Allocation for Mining ‚û∫ Last month, Pakistan announced to allocate 2,000 MW of electricity to power bitcoin mining and AI data centres. ‚û∫ This will help monetize surplus energy, while also boosting SBR and job creation. ‚û∫ An overall win for the country and its‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/YS2Dul2Ehf ‚Äî Cas Abb√© (@cas_abbe) June 5, 2025 Unused Power Becomes a Massive Drain The country currently has an installed electricity capacity of 46,600 MW, but nearly 14% of this remains idle for much of the year. During low-demand winter months, consumption can drop to just 12,000 MW. Despite not being used, many of these plants continue receiving capacity payments, which are fixed fees paid whether electricity is generated or not. Moreover, these payments have now reached around $7.4 billion a year, heavily burdening the national budget and increasing electricity costs for citizens. Rapid Solar Growth Creates New Challenges Pakistan has also seen a boom in solar energy. In 2024 alone, net-metered solar capacity surged from 1.3 GW to nearly 4.9 GW, driven by an influx of over 17 GW of low-cost Chinese solar panels. While solar energy is a cleaner alternative, it has brought new issues like grid instability and uneven cost distribution. Non-solar users now pay higher rates, and poorer households struggle to access affordable energy solutions. Bitcoin Mining Offers a Digital Lifeline To address this growing imbalance, the government has floated the idea of using idle power for Bitcoin mining . The proposal suggests that crypto mining could absorb excess electricity during off-peak times, reduce pressure on the grid, and generate digital revenue. This could help offset the huge losses from capacity payments and offer a new income stream for the state. .article-inside-link { margin-left: 0 !important; border: 1px solid #0052CC4D; border-left: 0; border-right: 0; padding: 10px 0; text-align: left; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li { font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; font-weight: 600; list-style-type: none; margin-bottom: 0; display: inline-block; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li:last-child { display: none; } Also Read : Can Pakistan‚Äôs Bitcoin Mining Move Impact BTC Price? Experts Doubt It , Concerns About the Plan Not everyone is convinced. Some worry that running old power plants just to mine Bitcoin could increase pollution. Others question whether the money made will truly benefit ordinary citizens or just end up in the hands of private companies. A Real-World Test for Crypto If Pakistan can pull this off, it could become a rare example of using crypto mining to solve a real economic problem. The success of the plan will depend on how it is managed and whether the benefits are shared fairly. .article_register_shortcode { padding: 18px 24px; border-radius: 8px; display: flex; align-items: center; margin: 6px 0 22px; border: 1px solid #0052CC4D; background: linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) 0%, rgba(0, 82, 204, 0.1) 100%); } .article_register_shortcode .media-body h5 { color: #000000; font-weight: 600; font-size: 20px; line-height: 22px; text-align:left; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body h5 span { color: #0052CC; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body p { font-weight: 400; font-size: 14px; line-height: 22px; color: #171717B2; margin-top: 4px; text-align:left; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body{ padding-right: 14px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-button a { float: right; } .article_register_shortcode .primary-button img{ vertical-align: middle; width: 20px; margin: 0; display: inline-block; } @media (min-width: 581px) and (max-width: 991px) { .article_register_shortcode .media-body p { margin-bottom: 0; } } @media (max-width: 580px) { .article_register_shortcode { display: block; padding: 20px; } .article_register_shortcode img { max-width: 50px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body h5 { font-size: 16px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body { margin-left: 0px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body p { font-size: 13px; line-height: 20px; margin-top: 6px; margin-bottom: 14px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-button a { float: unset; } .article_register_shortcode .secondary-button { margin-bottom: 0; } } Never Miss a Beat in the Crypto World! if (checkbox) { checkbox.checked = !checkbox.checked; updateSubscriptionButton(); } } }); FAQs Will Bitcoin mining truly help Pakistan reduce its energy costs and shortages? The plan aims to convert idle electricity capacity, which costs Pakistan $7.4 billion annually in payments, into revenue through Bitcoin mining. This could offset losses and utilize surplus power, potentially reducing energy costs and easing grid pressure, especially during off-peak hours. What environmental impacts could arise from using old coal plants for crypto mining? Using old, inefficient power plants, often coal-fired, for crypto mining could significantly increase air pollution and carbon emissions, counteracting global efforts to combat climate change and potentially creating local environmental concerns. Could this energy strategy set a precedent for other countries facing similar crises? Yes, if successful, Pakistan‚Äôs strategy could serve as a unique blueprint for other developing nations with surplus energy capacity or seasonal energy imbalances, demonstrating how digital asset generation might address economic and energy challenges.

title: Japan to Press G7 on Coordinated Crypto Crackdown Targeting North Korea
body: Japan is preparing to urge G7 nations to launch a coordinated response against North Korea‚Äôs growing involvement in cryptocurrency theft, with Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba expected to raise the issue at the upcoming summit in Canada from June 15 to 17. Key Takeaways: Japan will urge G7 nations to coordinate action against North Korean crypto thefts at the June summit. The push follows a $307M hack on DMM Bitcoin, linked to North Korea‚Äôs TraderTraitor group. If adopted, it would mark the G7‚Äôs first joint response to nation-state threats in the crypto sector. According to Japanese media reports , Ishiba will call for greater collaboration among member states to improve oversight of digital asset markets and restrict illicit financial flows tied to state-sponsored hacking groups. The goal is to address cybercrime that supports North Korea‚Äôs weapons programs and undermines international non-proliferation efforts. G7 May Take First Joint Action on North Korea Crypto Threats If adopted, the initiative would mark the first time the G7 formally discusses collective action on crypto-related threats linked to a nation-state. The Group of Seven includes Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, the UK, the U.S., and the European Union. Japan‚Äôs renewed focus comes in the wake of a $307 million theft from DMM Bitcoin, one of the country‚Äôs largest exchanges. Investigators from Japan‚Äôs National Police Agency and the FBI have attributed the May 2023 breach to the North Korean hacking group TraderTraitor , also known as Jade Sleet and UNC4899. The hack reportedly began with a social engineering scheme, where a North Korean operative posing as a recruiter gained access to an employee at Ginco, a wallet software provider servicing DMM Bitcoin. The operative deployed a malicious Python script that infiltrated Ginco‚Äôs internal systems. This access was later used to manipulate a transaction request, enabling the theft of more than 4,500 BTC. Authorities traced the stolen funds to wallets operated by TraderTraitor, a group already under U.S. sanctions for its role in cyberattacks aimed at funding North Korea‚Äôs military ambitions. The DMM incident forced the exchange to suspend operations and drew renewed attention to the vulnerabilities in crypto infrastructure. North Korea Linked to Major Crypto Hacks North Korea has also been linked to several other major crypto heists, including those targeting Bybit , the Ronin Bridge , Harmony, and various DeFi platforms. Global law enforcement is responding. The U.S. Department of Justice recently moved to seize over $7.7 million in digital assets tied to North Korean IT workers embedded in blockchain firms. Meanwhile, the U.S. and South Korea signed a bilateral agreement in 2023 to enhance their technical capabilities in detecting and countering DPRK cyber operations. North Korean cyber strategies continue to evolve. In April, Lazarus-linked operatives reportedly set up U.S.-based shell companies to distribute malware to crypto developers. Kraken recently thwarted an infiltration attempt by a suspected North Korean posing as a job candidate. BREAKING: KRAKEN CAUGHT A NORTH KOREAN HACKER TRYING TO STEAL IT'S #BITCOIN THIS IS WILD!! pic.twitter.com/togb4KyBNJ ‚Äî The Bitcoin Historian (@pete_rizzo_) May 1, 2025 The post Japan to Press G7 on Coordinated Crypto Crackdown Targeting North Korea appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Bitcoin Sentiment Explodes While Bitcoin Hyper Soars: Best Presale in 2025 About to Take Off?
body: There‚Äôs much ado about Bitcoin these days. After notching a new all-time of $111.9K on May 22, 2025, $BTC has been trading back and forth below that mark, never falling below $100K. But usually holding sideways between $105K-$110K. But Bitcoin sentiment is beginning to build again. Will it lead to a new push for the market? If so, then the aptly-named Bitcoin Hyper ($HYPER) presale could gain the most as Bitcoin‚Äôs first Layer-2 implementing the Solana Virtual Machine. Long-Time HODLers Selling at $100K One reason for the recent selling pressure might be long-term Bitcoin hodlers finally choosing to sell. Early investors who bought Bitcoin when the price was a few thousand (Bitcoin was below $10K only a few years ago, on July 1, 2020) might be finally ready to cash out now that $BTC has gone 10x or more from their original investment. Is that a bad sign for Bitcoin investors? Not necessarily. A potential tightening of Bitcoin‚Äôs supply will likely offset the increased selling pressure. On-chain data supports that conclusion, as the amount of exchange-held Bitcoins has steadily fallen, even as Bitcoin‚Äôs price rises. In fact, only weakening demand may have kept $BTC‚Äôs price down so far. And that‚Äôs not likely to continue forever. Bitwise CEO: ‚ÄòNo One Is Going To Sell‚Äô Once Bitcoin Breaks Through Bitwise CEO Hunter Horsley thinks that tightening supply will only worsen once Bitcoin breaks through $130K-$150K. At that point, the HODLers will return, diamond hands and everything. If he‚Äôs correct, then the issue of tightening supply will kick in harder than ever. And the first and perhaps only immutable law of economics ‚Äì supply and demand ‚Äì could supercharge Bitcoin‚Äôs price. Institutional investors being more bullish than ever also helps the narrative, even as retail investors go back-and-forth with Bitcoin. Take GameStop, which recently purchased 4.7K Bitcoin and plans to offer $1.75B of convertible notes to potentially fund more purchases. A recent Santiment report shows that Bitcoin positivity is returning in the community , with positive comments outweighing the negative by more than 2-1. Growing Bitcoin hype means at least one thing: $BTC-centric presales like Bitcoin Hyper could grow big ‚Äì fast. Bitcoin Hyper ($HYPER) ‚Äì Unlock Fast, Cheap Bitcoin Transactions with First Bitcoin Layer 2 More than a store of value; with Bitcoin Hyper ($HYPER) , Bitcoin can finally be everything it was meant to be ‚Äì the home of crypto payments, meme coins , dApps, and smart contracts. The technical framework for Bitcoin Hyper is straightforward; with the Bitcoin Relay Program, any $BTC deposited to a specific Bitcoin address can be minted on the Bitcoin Hyper Layer 2. That Layer 2 leverages the Solana Virtual Machine (SVM) for better throughput and increased scalability, and sets $HYPER up to be one of the strongest crypto presales so far in 2025. The end result is a Zero-Knowledge (ZK) equipped Layer 2, trustless but fully synced to the Bitcoin Layer 1 blockchain. $HYPER, the native token for the Bitcoin Layer 2, provides a number of benefits for $HYPER chain users. Those benefits include: Low gas fees, paid in $HYPER Staking rewards, currently 647% APY Participation incentives Developer bounties Bitcoin Hyper‚Äôs presale rocketed out of the gate, passing $1M raised in a matter of days. Token currently cost $0.01185, with $1.13M raised so far. That price could reach $0.02595 by the end of 2025 (for a 118% increase), according to our price prediction . Buy into the $HYPER , and join a community of visionaries who want to transform Bitcoin‚Äôs position in the dApp industry. Bullish Outlook Means Growing Demand for Bitcoin and Bitcoin Hyper As $BTC supply tightens, demand will only increase. That should fuel a further increase for both $BTC and related projects, like a groundbreaking Bitcoin Layer 2. And if you consider $HYPER‚Äôs utility is all about making Bitcoin more prepared for the adoption ahead, the project‚Äôs potential in the market becomes beyond clear. Remember, always do your own research; this isn‚Äôt financial advice.

title: Ethereum Eyes $3K After $1.8B in Shorts Liquidated at 15-week High
body: Ethereum‚Äôs Open Interest Soars to All-Time High Ethereum‚Äôs futures open interest (OI) has surpassed $40 billion for the first time ever, signaling record-high leverage and heightened market speculation. Open interest refers to the total number of active contracts that haven‚Äôt been settled or closed. Therefore, a high open interest suggests that more investors are either speculating on Ethereum‚Äôs future price or hedging their spot holdings to manage risk. An all-time high (ATH) in OI often precedes significant price movement, as a build-up of leveraged positions can lead to short squeezes or long squeezes, depending on trader bias. It can also lead to liquidations, which amplify price swings. CoinGlass data reveals $2B in long positions set for liquidation at $2,600 and $1.8B in shorts at $2,900, creating a high-stakes tug-of-war. With liquidity clustered at both ends, market makers face a pivotal decision on which side to target next. Therefore, caution should not be thrown to the wind because Ethereum‚Äôs price can go either way. At the time of this writing, ETH was experiencing a pullback to trade at $2,770 per CoinGecko data . Ethereum is Attracting More Institutional Interest Than Bitcoin Ethereum exchange-traded funds (ETFs) have drawn over $800 million in the past two weeks, which is more than double Bitcoin‚Äôs inflows of around $400 million, according to SoSoValue data. This can be linked to the fact that there‚Äôs growing speculation that ETH ETFs will soon incorporate staking‚Äîallowing investors to earn yield on ETH holdings without handling the technical side themselves. As a result, this staking optionality is drawing fresh capital into Ethereum compared to Bitcoin ETFs, which lack similar yield features. Jeff Mei, the COO at crypto exchange BTSE, opined, ‚ÄúInvestors are finally recognizing the compelling investment opportunity that Ethereum presents. It‚Äôs still trading well below its all-time highs, while Bitcoin is already near its ATH levels.‚Äù He added that there is a high probability that Ethereum will reach or surpass its ATH by year‚Äôs end. ETH‚Äôs historic high price currently sits at $4,878 recorded in November 2021. Ethereum exchange supply hitting a 7-year low also paints a bullish picture, thanks to the intensified hodling taking place. DeFi‚Äôs Resurgence Propels Ethereum to New Heights as TVL Surpasses $65 Billion and Institutional Demand Surges Ethereum‚Äôs momentum in mid‚Äë2025 is being turbocharged by a resurgence in DeFi activity, fueled by record demand, infrastructure upgrades, and institutional inflows. Ethereum now commands roughly $65.45‚ÄØbillion of DeFi‚Äôs global total value locked (TVL), according to DeFiLlama data. Innovations Lowering Friction Upgrades like Spectra, EIP‚Äë4844 blobs, and the forthcoming Pectra upgrade are reducing fees and boosting scalability, enabling smoother DeFi operations. Additionally, emerging ZK‚Äërollup solutions are proving capable of processing more than 70 swaps per second‚Äîa dramatic improvement over Ethereum‚Äôs base rate of ~12 TPS. These developments enhance composability and user experience in borrowing, staking, and trading. Diversified Protocol Strength Ethereum‚Äôs DeFi suite has broadened in functionality: Lido leads liquid staking, helping depositors earn staking yields while keeping assets liquid for DeFi use. Aave dominates lending markets with its GHO stablecoin and cross‚Äëchain lending pools. EigenLayer and EtherFi enable restaking, allowing users to earn extra yield while bolstering network security. Sky (MakerDAO‚Äôs evolution) now offers high‚Äëyield stablecoins and vaults, growing TVL over 55% in recent months. Institutional Capital & Macro Tailwinds Ethereum‚Äôs deep liquidity and strong developer ecosystem are drawing institutional interest. Whales are shifting assets into self‚Äëcustody and DeFi vs. exchanges, increasing on‚Äëchain demand . Broader macro trends‚Äîpotential interest‚Äërate cuts and stablecoin growth‚Äîboost DeFi yield attractiveness compared to traditional fixed income. Network Effects Amidst Competition Ethereum remains the dominant platform, hosting over half of the global DeFi TVL. Although competitive ecosystems are growing (Solana up 800% Y/Y, newer chains like Aptos gaining traction), none match Ethereum‚Äôs composability, developer momentum, or market share. Conclusion Ethereum‚Äôs DeFi renaissance‚Äîrooted in record TVL, cross‚Äëprotocol innovation, on‚Äëchain capital flow, and protocol upgrades‚Äîhas created a positive feedback loop. As TVL rises, more builders are incentivized to innovate, attracting users and assets, reinforcing Ethereum‚Äôs network effects. Nevertheless, it remains to be seen how Ethereum plays out in the short term because liquidity is clustered in both bullish and bearish sides, with the psychological price of $3,000 expected to be a turning point.

title: Senators Warren and Blumenthal Go to War Against Meta‚Äôs New Stablecoin Scheme, Calling it a ‚ÄòThreat‚Äô
body: Democratic Senators Elizabeth Warren and Richard Blumenthal launched a direct challenge against Meta‚Äôs CEO Mark Zuckerberg, sending a formal letter on Wednesday demanding comprehensive disclosure about the tech company‚Äôs revived interest in stablecoin payment systems. The timing of this congressional inquiry proves particularly significant, as the Senate prepares to vote on upcoming stablecoin regulation legislation . The lawmakers argue that, given Meta‚Äôs enormous market influence, it has become imperative for both Congress and the American public to gain complete transparency regarding the company‚Äôs cryptocurrency ambitions. Why Warren Calls Meta‚Äôs Stablecoin a ‚ÄòMonopolistic Threat‚Äô to the US Economy In their June 12 correspondence , the senators articulated their concerns about the broader implications of technology giants entering the digital currency space. ‚ÄúBig Tech companies‚Äô issuing or controlling their own private currencies, like a stablecoin, would threaten competition across the economy, erode financial privacy, and cede control of the U.S. money supply to monopolistic platforms that have a history of abusing their power,‚Äù the senators wrote. Source: U.S. States Senate Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs Zuckerberg has been given a five-day deadline until June 17 to provide detailed responses to eight specific inquiries about Meta‚Äôs stablecoin strategy. These questions encompass which external companies Meta has engaged for consultation and whether the corporation is actively considering developing its own stablecoin. The senators are also seeking information about Meta‚Äôs lobbying activities regarding cryptocurrency legislation and the company‚Äôs stance on potential amendments that would prevent ‚ÄúBig Tech‚Äù firms from controlling stablecoin issuers. Zuckerberg questioned by the U.S Senate/ Source: Senate.Gov Warren and Blumenthal referenced Meta‚Äôs previous ventures into digital currency through the Libra and Diem projects, which debuted in 2019. These initiatives ultimately failed due to overwhelming regulatory pressure and opposition from both political parties , leading to the sale of all related assets by 2022. Will the GENIUS Act Hand Stablecoin Control to Big Tech? Senate Vote Sparks Fury The letter also highlights concerns about potential regulatory exceptions that could benefit Meta. The senators worry about President Donald Trump potentially granting the company a waiver under the GENIUS Act, which could allow Meta to circumvent regulations other stablecoin issuers must follow. #DontMessWithMedicaid (The Genius Act Page 2 of 2) The bill also includes a giant carve-out to ensure Musk‚Äôs social media platform X, formerly Twitter, would not be covered by even modest restrictions, thereby ‚Äúgifting the President‚Äôs closest Big Tech ally a competitive‚Ä¶ ‚Äî Harold Katlin (@HaroldKatl3281) June 9, 2025 The lawmakers warned about privacy implications if Meta were to control its stablecoin infrastructure. ‚ÄúIf Meta controlled its own stablecoin, the company could further pry into consumers‚Äô transactions and commercial activity,‚Äù the senators wrote. This congressional investigation stems from a May 8 report revealing that Meta has been discussing incorporating stablecoins into its platform ecosystem with various cryptocurrency companies, including Instagram, Facebook, and WhatsApp. At the time of initial reporting, it remained uncertain whether Meta intended to partner with established stablecoin providers like Tether or Circle or planned to develop its own proprietary solution. Meta Says ‚ÄòNo Stablecoin‚Äô ‚Äî But Senators Found Evidence of Secret Crypto Talks Meta communications director Andy Stone responded to the May reports by confirming that the Diem project had been permanently discontinued, stating that Diem is ‚Äúdead‚Äù and that there was ‚Äúno Meta stablecoin.‚Äù To be clear: as Mark said (and as the story notes), Diem is ‚Äúdead.‚Äù There is no Meta stablecoin. https://t.co/U1DN2VXM9Q ‚Äî Andy Stone (@andymstone) May 8, 2025 However, subsequent reporting by Fortune suggested that Meta was actively negotiating with multiple cryptocurrency firms regarding stablecoin payment integration. Drawing from available information, Meta‚Äôs primary interest lies in the practical advantages of stablecoins over traditional fiat currencies, particularly regarding cost-effective international transfers and cross-border payments. Circle‚Äôs Senior Director of Business Development Matt Cavin, who previously held an executive position at Web3 gaming company Immutable until March, is reportedly spearheading the discussions. "We are crossing the chasm from early adopters to mainstream acceptance (of stablecoins)." ‚Äì @jerallaire , co-founder of @circle "The laws and regulations of a publicly traded company matter in terms of trust, transparency, compliance, and governance." "We're a market-neutral‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/UaBmq51WV1 ‚Äî TBPN (@tbpn) June 6, 2025 Additionally, Ginger Baker, whom Meta recruited as Vice President of Product in January, is said to be contributing to the stablecoin initiative. Baker brings significant cryptocurrency expertise, having served on the board of the Stellar Development Foundation and previously working as a senior director of products at Ripple. The post Senators Warren and Blumenthal Go to War Against Meta‚Äôs New Stablecoin Scheme, Calling it a ‚ÄòThreat‚Äô appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Bithumb Chairman Lee Jung-hoon‚Äôs Surprising Bail Release: What It Means for South Korea Crypto
body: BitcoinWorld Bithumb Chairman Lee Jung-hoon‚Äôs Surprising Bail Release: What It Means for South Korea Crypto In a development that has sent ripples through the South Korean cryptocurrency market, Bithumb Chairman , Lee Jung-hoon, has been released on bail. This release comes after he spent six months in custody, following an initial conviction related to bribery allegations. Who is Lee Jung-hoon and What Were the Charges? Lee Jung-hoon is the former chairman of Bithumb Holdings, the holding company behind one of South Korea‚Äôs largest cryptocurrency exchanges, Bithumb. His legal troubles stem from allegations that he accepted substantial bribes ‚Äì reportedly several hundred million won ‚Äì in exchange for listing two specific cryptocurrencies on the Crypto Exchange platform. The case has been closely watched as it involves a high-profile figure in the South Korea Crypto industry and touches upon critical issues of listing integrity and potential corruption within exchanges. In the first trial, Lee was found guilty and sentenced to two years in prison. This conviction led to his detention starting in December 2024. Understanding the Bithumb Bail : Details of the Release The decision to grant Bithumb Bail to Lee Jung-hoon was reported by Digital Asset. His release signifies a shift in his legal status while the case potentially moves forward, likely through appeals. The court imposed several conditions upon his release, designed to ensure he remains available for future legal proceedings and does not interfere with the case. These conditions include: A strict restriction on changing his registered residence. A ban on leaving South Korea without explicit court approval. A substantial bail deposit of 50 million won (approximately $36,500 USD). A prohibition on contacting individuals who are involved in the ongoing case. These conditions are standard in cases where bail is granted after a conviction, reflecting the court‚Äôs need to balance the individual‚Äôs rights with the requirements of the justice system. What Does This Mean for the Crypto Exchange Landscape in South Korea Crypto ? The release of a figure as prominent as the former Bithumb Chairman on Bithumb Bail naturally raises questions about the broader implications for the South Korea Crypto market and the regulatory environment surrounding Crypto Exchange operations. While the bail itself does not overturn the initial conviction, it allows Lee to potentially participate more actively in his defense during the appeal process. For Bithumb, the ongoing legal saga involving its former chairman continues to be a point of scrutiny, although the company has sought to distance its current operations from the charges against Lee, which relate to past alleged actions. Challenges for the industry include maintaining investor confidence amidst high-profile legal cases. The focus on listing practices in this case highlights the ongoing global regulatory push for greater transparency and integrity on trading platforms. The South Korea Crypto market, being one of the most active globally, is particularly sensitive to such developments. Looking Ahead: What‚Äôs Next After the Bithumb Bail ? The release on Bithumb Bail is not the end of the legal process for Lee Jung-hoon . The case is expected to move to higher courts for appeal, where the initial conviction will be reviewed. The outcome of these appeals will be crucial in determining the final legal standing of the former Bithumb Chairman . Observers of the South Korea Crypto scene and the global Crypto Exchange market will be watching closely for developments in this case, as it could set precedents or influence future regulatory approaches to exchange operations and executive accountability. Summary Former Bithumb Chairman , Lee Jung-hoon , has been granted Bithumb Bail after six months in custody following his initial conviction on bribery charges related to listing cryptocurrencies on the Crypto Exchange . His release comes with specific conditions, and the case remains ongoing within the South Korea Crypto legal system. This development underscores the legal challenges facing high-profile figures in the industry and the continued scrutiny on exchange operations. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends and legal developments impacting the South Korea Crypto space, explore our articles on key developments shaping the Crypto Exchange landscape. This post Bithumb Chairman Lee Jung-hoon‚Äôs Surprising Bail Release: What It Means for South Korea Crypto first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent Talked About Cryptocurrencies!
body: While important developments continue to occur regarding Bitcoin (BTC) and the cryptocurrency market in the USA, important statements came from US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent. US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent touched on stablecoins, which have been a subject of debate in recent months, in his statement to the Senate subcommittee. Bessent said dollar-backed stablecoins could reach a market value of $2 trillion or more. Emphasizing that stablecoins have the potential to expand the global use of the US dollar, Bessent noted that Congress is advancing legislation requiring stablecoins to be backed by high-quality assets such as US Treasury Bonds. Bessent stated that there have been many incidents throughout history where the status of the dollar has been questioned, but such fears have been proven unfounded as new dynamics have given the US dollar new momentum. ‚ÄúThis administration is committed to preserving Bitcoin‚Äôs reserve currency status in America and advancing blockchain technology. Stablecoin legislation backed by U.S. Treasury Bonds or Treasury Notes would create a market through these stablecoins that would expand the use of the U.S. dollar around the world. ‚ÄúI think 2 trillion is a very, very reasonable number for the stablecoin market, and I can see it being much higher.‚Äù The US Treasury Secretary recently reiterated that the US government is seeking to solidify the dollar‚Äôs reserve currency status by supporting legislation that would further embed stablecoins into the financial system and include strict rules that would ensure they are fully backed by Treasury bonds and other short-term government debt. Meanwhile, great efforts are being made to pass the GENIUS bill, which is seen as cryptocurrency-friendly, in Congress. Related News: New Development in the US's Cryptocurrency-Friendly GENIUS Bill! "Expected on Wednesday!" *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent Talked About Cryptocurrencies!

title: Binance CEO Richard Teng Declares: Institutions Are Going All-In on Crypto
body: The post Binance CEO Richard Teng Declares: Institutions Are Going All-In on Crypto appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Binance CEO Richard Teng just dropped an update on Wall Street. In an X post , Teng declared the next decade won‚Äôt be about crypto hype but its deep integration into global finance. Forget the old ‚Äúshould we invest?‚Äù Institutions are now focused on how to make crypto a cornerstone of their strategies. Here‚Äôs why this shift is massive and what it means for the future. Institutions Are All In Teng points to real changes that are underway. Heavyweights like Moody‚Äôs and Alphaledger just pulled off a historic trial, tokenizing municipal bonds on the Solana blockchain with embedded credit ratings. This is the first time that tokenized debt on a public chain is being experimented with by a leading ratings agency. In the meantime, Vivek Ramaswamy co-founded Strive Asset Management, funded an incredible $750 million to buy distressed Bitcoin-linked debt, including claims from Mt. Gox. These aren‚Äôt small bets; they scream confidence in crypto as a legit, long-term asset class. Crypto Winter? It Might Be Over The long crypto winters we‚Äôve seen in the past might be behind us. Michael Saylor‚Äîknown for his massive Bitcoin investments ‚Äì recently said as much, pointing to growing government support and clearer regulation as signs the space is maturing. Teng seems to agree. And the numbers back it up: a new survey from Coinbase found that 83% of institutional investors plan to increase their crypto holdings in 2025. This isn‚Äôt about guessing what might happen. It‚Äôs already happening, whether people notice it or not. The Financial World‚Äôs New Playbook The rules are being rewritten by this institutional push. Wall Street is embracing digital assets with tokenized bonds and Bitcoin debt arrangements. Teng‚Äôs point is very clear: the discussion of cryptocurrency has moved from skepticism to strategy. A decade of unheard-of development and legitimacy is ahead of us when blockchain and finance clash. The takeaway? Richard Teng‚Äôs statement highlights that crypto‚Äôs institutional wave is here, and it‚Äôs bringing opportunity like never before. Watch closely, this is the future of finance unfolding.
